=====Erebus=====
*<s>Context for [[Sarrish/Legends|Sarrish]].</s>
*<s>Similarly to how star system and sector articles are written, you can remove the mention of it being a squad per its name. So it would become '"A" Squad served under...' or something similar.</s>
*<s>Infoboxes don't indent asterisks more than twice, so the affiliations should only say [[Galactic Republic/Legends|Galactic Republic]] and [[212th Attack Battalion/Legends|212th Attack Battalion]].</s>
*<s>You could probably say that the squad's phase II armor featured yellow markings.</s>
*<s>The BTS should include [[Dark Horse Comics]] as the comics' publisher. It also doesn't need to include "first," since it only appears in one source.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 06:04, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**All addressed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 18:05, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
***You should be using [[Template:DarkHorse]] as the cite template, unless there's a reason you're using [[Template:Cite web]]? [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 17:29, 21 April 2022 (UTC)
****The copy of the comic I used was from ''[[Star Wars Legends Epic Collection: The Clone Wars Vol. 3]]'' and not the original comic itself, so I was only able to verify its release date using the website. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 06:14, 24 April 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>"''The clone forces were ordered to shatter the front lines of the opposing Separatist forces, and eliminate any remaining pockets of resistance by Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi''" This would be clearer if the fact that Kenobi was giving the orders was mentioned earlier in the sentence. Also only his last name should be used, since he's already been mentioned in the description</s>
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:36, 4 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Specify that ARC-170s are fighters</s>
**Specified. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:36, 4 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Cody's clone designation should be mentioned in the body</s>
**Already mentioned in the [["A" Squad#Description|Description]] section of the body.
***You might be thinking of something else, its' definitely not there
****Yes, I misunderstood. It is fixed now. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 07:54, 9 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Marshal Commander is inconsistently capitalized throughout</s>
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:36, 4 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Publication date should use {{Tl|DarkHorse}}</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 12:16, 3 June 2022 (UTC)
**See the last objection from [[User:Erebus Chronus|Erebus Chronus]]. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:36, 4 June 2022 (UTC)
***I saw that and I don't understand the logic there. Since you're citing information from DarkHorse.com its far better to use our citation template for it instead of Cite web, regardless of the version of the comic you have access to. [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 12:54, 8 June 2022 (UTC)
****Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 00:21, 9 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The first sentence of the description kind of reads as though Cody and the lieutenant were the commanders of the whole Grand Army of the Republic</s>
**Rephrased. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The first sentence of the history section is all sourced to the date ref, which shouldn't be the case</s>
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''After giving Commander Cody and the rest of the 212th their objective, Kenobi departed.''" Is the location of this meeting shown in the comic? It should be clear where Kenobi is departing from</s>
**There is no specific known location other than the fact they're on Sarrish, which is already mentioned earlier in the same paragraph. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
***Made a copy-edit just to make it clear that they were already on Sarrish when receiving those orders
*<s>Missing body links, [[Clone trooper/Legends|clone trooper]], [[Trooper/Legends|trooper]]</s>
**Former link was already in the body's Description section, though I see you added another so I've reorganized the links to be in the correct order. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''The crash landed the squad precisely where Kenobi had ordered them to avoid, and thinking quickly, the lieutenant leading the squad ordered the troops to prepare to attack.'' It should be restated where Kenobi had told them to avoid, and what the lieutenant ordered them to attack. Likewise for the "''affix grapples''" part of the next sentence, where are they affixing grapples to?</s>
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''Despite "A" Squad's small victory''" needs to be sourced to the comic, not to the Clone Wars episode</s>
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
***Got this in my copy-edit but in cases like that please make sure that you're not accidentally adding redundant referencing
*<s>[https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/%22A%22_Squad?type=revision&diff=11516090&oldid=11503356 Please check my copy-edit, added missing links and tightened up some of the phrasing]</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 07:48, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
**Looks good. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 03:57, 15 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I'd like to see the last couple of sentences in the intro be rewritten to have a more specific outline of the events of the comic. The part about the battle being a loss for the Republic can probably be removed</s>
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 06:29, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>''"were then ordered to affix grapples to their DC-15A blaster rifles and follow Cody"'' here you should specify were Cody was leading them and what their objective had become</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 12:36, 27 June 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 06:29, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>There's some details in [[Battle of Sarrish/Legends]], an old featured article, that would be relevant here, however I don't have access to the comic so please defer to that if there's any contradictions</s>
**''"Separatists shot down the gunship carrying him and "A" Squad just thirty seconds away from the designated landing zone"
***Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 23:10, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
**"Using the fallen craft as cover from droid fire"
***Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 23:10, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
**"As Cody grappled with the battle droids guarding the gun's ammunition stockpiles" [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 02:58, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
***Fixed. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 23:10, 13 July 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>"''Desert Sands sandtrooper''" I must admit the naming doesn't fit well, and since I can find other official names for the specialisation (I'm assuming from the capitalisation that Desert Sands santrooper is an official term), I would recommend adjusting it to remove the repeated use of "sand." (Anakin would be most grateful :P)
*The second bio header appears a tad beefy to be a section title, especially since a comma has to split it. I think it would be better to merge the elements of the title somehow to make it smaller.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 00:09, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 00:14, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Context needed for Han Solo.
*Since the first bio image doesn't depict events around 1047, it can be used in the second second instead to spread out the clutter.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 10:14, 23 March 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:06, 23 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>"Human" needs a note instead of a flat reference to a source that does not mention the subject.</s>
*<s>Seeing the lead quote makes me skeptical that the subject is indeed named "1047" and not "Ten forty-seven." What's the story here? We're not supposed to convert such names to numbers if no sources do so.</s>
*<s>Please mention the pauldron in Equipment.</s>
*<s>Context for ''A New Hope''.</s>
*<s>Mediacat?</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 06:05, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
**All addressed. As for the name, he's called ten forty-seven in quotes, 1047 in narrative text. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:12, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
***Then the name should be documented here as an alternate name for the subject. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 03:39, 28 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Dani=====
*<s>The second paragraph under Capturing Theed reads that 1933 was present for the events of the capturing and that isn't depicted in the movie, as far as I know. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 18:17, 24 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**What do you mean? He was deployed along with the rest of the droid army. Doesn't have to be depicted since [[2163]] says that he was part of the invasion force.
*<s>"the battle droid was destroyed by Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn after they entered the hangar, which allowed them to board the starship and escape the planet with Queen Padmé Amidala and her entourage." This should be reworded as it appears the droid enetered the hangar. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 18:17, 24 March 2022 (UTC)</s>
**Wording mistake. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 18:23, 24 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan=====
*<s>"which allowed them to board the starship and escape the planet" It should clarify who 'them' is. So far in this particular sentence only the droid and Qui-Gon have been mentioned (one destroyed, the other male), and Padme and the handimaidens haven't been introduced until the next clause. This should be reworded.</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:09, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed. Was a single word change, by the way. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 22:22, 25 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>It's a little unclear who "he" is here - Jinn or the droid, I'm assuming - "where he was shortly ordered to halt by 2163".</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 20:50, 11 May 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed yesterday. Didn't leave a message. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 16:42, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Ecks=====
*<s>Is it really relevant to this particular droid that Sidious was behind the invasion plan? Seems like mentioning Gunray would suffice. 
*"''As a result, the Federation was able to capture the planet's capital of Theed, leading to its subsequent occupation and capture of its citizens.''" Two instances of the "capture" here, maybe reword one of them. 
*"''After entering the hangar, Jinn steadily approached[4] 1933 and the other droids,[2] causing a brief moment of uncertainty between the droids as the Jedi assumed their positions,[4] where Jinn was shortly ordered to halt by 2163.''" The last clause here doesn't really connect well to the rest of the sentence; ''where'' exactly is Jinn ordered to halt? Maybe the clause could be moved to the next sentence where you talk about Jinn being halted, as well.
*"''However, before the droids could follow their orders and raise their blasters, Jinn activated his lightsaber and destroyed 2163, resulting in 1933's death in the Jedi's swing.''" If I'm understanding this correctly, 1933 and 2163 were killed in the same swing, right? If so, you could simply say "destroyed 2163 and 1933 in his swing", thus removing that last, somewhat choppy clause.</s> [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 17:42, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
**All should be done. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 22:24, 20 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>One more: you basically say twice that droids were deployed to the surface, in consecutive sentences. Can we reword to remove this redundancy?</s> [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 20:34, 27 May 2022 (UTC)
**Shouldn't really have mattered, since I was using it to help write that subsequent sentence. But it's been fixed a few days ago. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 15:22, 31 May 2022 (UTC)
***I don't think the current wording really works. The Trade Federation was able to claim control during the ongoing invasion/deployment, not afterward. [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 07:35, 1 June 2022 (UTC)
****How's that? [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 15:16, 1 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>We don't really need a separate ref for the Trade Federation Script's name. ***Examples of a similar case with Aurebesh: [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Millennial_Celebration_Invitation#Description 1], [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Sprite#Description 2], [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Bloody_Rancor#Description 3], [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Unidentified_clone_trooper_(Kamino_security)#Equipment 4]. None of these cite the name to another source since that is what we can see on screen. In my opinion, it would be like citing the name of a character's species to another source even though we can visually discern as such from looking at them. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 15:32, 3 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====
*<s></s>Oh hey, nice to see you here Tomotron! Couple things I'm noticing right away:<s></s>
*<s>Your two bio paragraphs are very long and can probably be split into two each. Once that's done, they can probably be subsectioned into two sections, making room for another quote and image, if available.
*A full release date for the comic is needed in the bts. I'll give it a full readthrough at another point, but looking pretty clean so far!</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 06:33, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
**Both should be done. &mdash;[[User:Tomotron|<span style="color:#FF0000;font-family:Algerian;">'''Tomotron'''</span>]][[File:Revanchist Sith.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Tomotron|<span style="color:#064CF8;font-family:Algerian;">'''Star Forge'''</span>]]</sup> 07:33, 14 June 2022 (UTC)
*<s>In the intro, the thing about the creature comes out of nowhere. Can you add a little context as to why he wants to kill it?
*I don't think that Emperor's Fist is the best context for Vader; most readers probably know him as a Sith Lord.
*Per [[WP:MOS#Ranks and titles]], "Do not capitalize ranks or titles when used as a substitute for the name."
*For comic articles "--" should be replaced with "&amp;mdash;"
*Per [[WP:MOS#Linking]], "do not link individual words within proper compound nouns" (ie [[Sith]] [[Lord]])
*"surprising Ahr, who was eating food" &mdash; was he eating food during the attack? If so I'd like that to be specified, otherwise it seems a little out of place to mention it.
*Please implement the [[WP:MOS#Serial comma|serial comma]].
*P+T: I don't think your last two sentences there are really necessary. They don't say anymore about his personality than the sentence prior to them does.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 20:14, 14 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>The first instance of the character's name should be cited to the source that uses it.</s>
*<s>You source the first instance of 3 ABY to NEC but don't do it for the next one. If Rogues Gallery supports the date then the NEC reference can go.</s>

*<s>No source supports the novelization release date.</s>

**All addressed.
***Alphabetization was pending but I've done myself now. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 15:44, 28 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Does Neff's scene in [[Star Wars Infinities: The Empire Strikes Back 1|''Star Wars Infinities: The Empire Strikes Back'' 1]] play out the same as the film? Either way, it requires documentation since this is an alternate history.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 09:10, 28 May 2022 (UTC)
**It does, and literally I'm not quite seeing how it needs to be documented when it doesn't alter the events at hand. We wouldn't document LEGO games when the only nature of the subject appearing doesn't contradict or offer new information. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:26, 28 May 2022 (UTC)
***FWIW, the scene in question has different dialogue between the other characters in the scene, acknowledging the different events being played out, but Neff remains without any lines, and as such, nothing different with him individually. Comparatively adaptations in similar situations, with characters saying different things in the scenes, or even different events around the characters, aren't documented. For [[Wuher/Legends|Wuher]], as an example, the LEGO games wouldn't be noted in behind the scenes for how, while he's in the cantina, unlike in the movie, Obi-Wan kills Ponda Baba, and doesn't attack Evazan, who just runs away, differing from how he injures both in the film. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:36, 28 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Speaking of LEGO games, it's unnecessary to mention omissions from them in the BTS, per precedent.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 15:44, 28 May 2022 (UTC)
**Deleted. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 15:50, 28 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Ecks Dee=====
*I don't usually make these types of objections, but this article is in desperate need of a copy-edit. There are numerous small issues that could and should have been caught prior to nomination, including but not limited to punctuation errors, improper capitalization, references before punctuation, missing grammatical articles, and tense issues. [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 21:31, 22 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Erebus=====
*AT-ST and AT-AT shouldn't be abbreviated for a first mention/link.
*The fact that the Battles of Hoth and Endor took place in 3 ABY and 4 ABY can't be sourced to those cards.
*Intro could be expanded a little bit.
*Not sure if the fact that the Battle of Hoth was an obvious tactical victory but a strategic failure for the Empire can be sourced straight to the film.
*A quote from Episode VI could probably be added. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 22:02, 22 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan=====
*Skin color in the infobox should be linked.
*"Ultimately, the battle would end in a tactical victory, though strategic failure for the Imperials." please elaborate on how it's a tactical but not strategic victory.
*"After the ambush of the Endor shield generator bunker, which was protecting the under construction Imperial battlestation, the Death Star II," [[Battle of Endor/Legends|Battle of Endor]] should be pipelinked through "ambush" instead of linked in the next sentence.
*Also, I don't beleive I've ever seen Death Star or Death Star II italicised. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 13:47, 3 March 2022 (UTC)

In fact, the whole segment, from "Although Vader technically ..." to end of the paragraph, could be rewritten to offer a better synthesis of information rather than a play by play of the comics dialogue. [[User:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #FF4500;">'''NanoLuuke'''</span>]]<sup>[[User_talk:NanoLuuke|<span style="color: #000000;">Cloning facility</span>]]</sup> 10:29, 12 July 2022 (UTC)</s>

=====Imp=====
*<s>Bit of dating ref trouble here: ref 4 doesn't need the "five years before the Starkiller Incident" info at all, since the article doesn't use the 29 ABY figure anywhere and is all about events in 34 ABY anyway. What the reference note ''does'' need, however, is show why the events of the episode ''must'' have occurred ''before'' 34 ABY, and therefore during the Cold War.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 21:53, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
**I've taken a shot at addressing it, if I can improve it in any way let me know. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 23:06, 11 March 2022 (UTC)
***Before I actually dive in and help you streamline it, let me ask this though: does the episode itself not support it being set during a time of tensions between the First Order and the Resistance? [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 14:46, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
****The episode does involve Kaz's mission to spy on the First Order, but no discussion is made of the Resistance's direct conflict with the First Order, just the First Order's activities on the ''Colossus''. There is no direct mention of the Cold War or the conflict. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:56, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
*****If it involves the Resistance spying on the First Order, it's completely fair to source the fact that there was a state of tension (=Cold War) between the two parties to the episode itself. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:21, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
******Revised. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 22:25, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please note in History that at some point that X-wing performed the maneuver against that TIE fighter.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 22:01, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
**Added. [[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 04:56, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>It seems to me that there's a bit of intro-exclusive information: the performer "briefly drifting" next to an asteroid, and then "blasting off away" from the asteroid. The Description doesn't really go into that much detail.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 19:47, 15 March 2022 (UTC)

[[Wookieepedia:Good article nominations/Bamayar]]
<div id="old-forum-warning" class="boilerplate metadata rfa" style="background-color: #F4F4F4; margin: 2em 0 0 0; padding: 0 10px 0 10px; border: 1px solid #AAAAAA;">
:''The following discussion is preserved as an archive of a [[Wookieepedia:Good articles|Good article nomination]] that was '''successful'''. <span style="color: red;">'''Please do not modify it.'''</span>[[Category:Wookieepedia Good article nomination pages archive|{{SUBPAGENAME}}]]
==[[{{#titleparts:Wookieepedia:Good article nominations/Bamayar||2}}]]==
*'''Nominated by''': [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 01:29, 3 June 2022 (UTC)
*'''Nomination comments''': Originally introduced as a terrestrial astro object in [[Battlefront: Twilight Company|BTC]], Bamayar was then mentioned again in the [[Rogue One: A Star Wars Story (novelization)|Rogue One novel]], which also conveniently gave a separate mention of [[Bamayar IX]], a gas giant which is thus&hellip;non-terrestrial. It makes me wonder if Bodhi Rook spent the majority of his OG Imperial career working around a Bamayar system with them both in. The encyclopedia does a lovely job of differentiating between the two and actually calling Bamayar a planet, which is always a lovely detail to catch up on. And thus I am here nominating them both.
*'''WookieeProject (optional)''': [[WP:AST]], [[WP:NOVELS]], [[WP:SWBF]]

{{GANvotes|Wookieepedia:Good article nominations/Bamayar|1}}
====Support====
#[[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 21:51, 15 June 2022 (UTC)

Also, it's better to do away with nebulous, informal language like "we can say" and use more definitive, concise language (simply "therefore") [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:36, 27 June 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Brockaroni=====
*<s>I don't see any need for subsectioning.</s>
**The subsection means there's room for two images in the bio, otherwise the first one overlaps with the infobox. Although I'd usually leave three paragraphs unsubsectioned I don't think it's excessive to do so and I'd say overall it benefits the reader more to leave it and keep the image. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 11:24, 1 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>The sectioning currently feels a little arbitrary with only 3 paragraphs in the body. I would prefer if it was eliminated entirely.</s>
**The sectioning allows for the image in the first paragraph as otherwise it overlaps with the infobox. While I usually wouldn't section three paragraphs, there's nothing forbidding it and I think overall the article and reader benefits more from the image being included then it would from being unsectioned. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 10:44, 10 March 2022 (UTC)

''New Edition'' should also be listed presumably.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 05:33, 10 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Samonic=====
*<s>"During the Around 18 BBY, as part of the Chiss Ascendancy crisis, two skirmishes occurred in the sector." Please clean that up.</s>
*<s>"And the second was a sneak attack on the Orisson as it was entering the system in order to prove that the Dasklo families where manufacturing fake warships." Could you establish who made the sneak attack?</s>
*<s>Description and history are missing several links. Everything that can be linked '''should''' be linked at the first mention (In the intro, and in the body).</s>
*<s>Context for ''[[Grayshrike]]'', ''[[Orisson]]'', [[Dasklo family]], Core name for [[Clarr'ivl'exow]], [[Clarr'os'culry]] and context for [[Jixtus]]. See [[Kilji homeland]] for an example on Jixtus' context if you wish.</s>
*<s>Is "a Grysk warship" linking to the intended model? I don't think the same model from ''[[Thrawn: Alliances]]'' and ''[[Thrawn: Treason]]'' appeared in the [[Star Wars: The Ascendancy Trilogy]] at all.</s>
*<s>[[Hyperspace]] should not be capitalized.</s>
*(Review note) &mdash; Use the "highlight duplicate links" tool to highlight duplicate links.&mdash; '''''[[User:Samonic|Samonic]]''''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]]  16:57, 16 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>I don't believe the section break is actually necessary in the current version of the article. Each of the subsections is just a single paragraph, which usually looks on the short side, plus it gives the impression that the subsectioning is done merely to add more quotes.</s>
*<s>Please double-check the quote punctuation.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 21:31, 24 April 2022 (UTC)
**I removed the section breaks and fixed the quote punctuation. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 01:26, 27 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''They destroyed the Grysk freighter''" &mdash; who is "they"? The Defense Fleet or the Clarr family? Can you clarify?</s>
*<s>And you mention "the Grysk freighter" although you previously only mention the Grysk Hegemony, so the freighter that by this point in the article is supposedly familiar to the reader in fact isn't. Please revise.</s>
*<s>"''to prove that the Dasklo family was manufacturing fake starships''" &mdash; er, can we get a bit of further context for this? What exactly does "fake starships" mean in this case, and why would a Chiss Patriarch need someone to prove this?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 15:44, 10 May 2022 (UTC)
**All context has been added. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:14, 12 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>In the body, you describe the first skirmish in Ornfra as involving four parties; in the intro, you just mention two of them. Please address this discrepancy.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:11, 13 May 2022 (UTC)
**The discrepancy has been resolved. -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 00:09, 15 May 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>Notes on my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Chiss_Ascendancy%27s_northeast-zenith_sector?curid=726446&diff=11571684&oldid=11548094 copy-edit]</s>
**Image sizes should always be specified. The standard thumbnail size is 300px.
**Rather than mention the concept of core names in the prose, simply saying ''Clarr'ivl'exow "Rivlex"'' is fine.
**Watch out for word choice. "However" implies contrasting statements, so it doesn't apply to the simple series of events here.
*<s>It's a good idea to vary your language, since it makes the text more interesting for readers</s>
**"''A sector was located in the northeast-zenith of the Chiss Ascendancy. It contained the Ornfra system and the planet Ornfra.''" &mdash;this is repeated word-for-word between the intro and the body. Try switching things around to make the article seem fresh to readers who first read the intro and then the body.
**There's a cluster of the word "after" in the body. See if you can reduce their usage. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 08:17, 3 July 2022 (UTC)
***I removed the afters and changed up to the body. How does it look now? -[[User:ThrawnChiss7|ThrawnChiss7]] ([[User talk:ThrawnChiss7|talk]]) 20:47, 13 July 2022 (UTC)
****Much better. Please observe my copy-edits [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Chiss_Ascendancy%27s_northeast-zenith_sector?type=revision&diff=11586826&oldid=11586720 here]; I mainly made adjustments to improve the article's flow. =====OOM=====
*<s>Welcome to the GAN! Good work overall; here are my preliminary objections:</s>
**Ambiguous terms such as "managed to" are typically reserved for when there's a special need for them, so it's best to remove it here.
***Removed [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**Files and templates need to use underscores in place of spaces (e.g. <nowiki>[[File:Luke_Skywalker.jpg]], not [[File:Luke Skywalker.jpg]]</nowiki>).
***Fixed [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**Since [[attack on the Zygerrian slave camp]] is a conjecturally titled article, "attack" should not be capitalised in the date reference.
***Fixed [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**The date reference should be fully cited as well. Some of the info in it is from ''Tempest Runner'', but that book isn't mentioned in it. Also, you have established that the attack must take place before ''Light of the Jedi'', but that doesn't necessarily mean it took place before the year in which LOTJ took place. Would "by 232 BBY" be a more accurate timeframe for the attack?
***Sourced and adjusted for accuracy [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**When pipelinking, always place all characters inside the link brackets (e.g. <nowiki>[[TIE/ln space superiority starfighter|TIE fighters]], not [[TIE/ln space superiority starfighter|TIE fighter]]s</nowiki>).
***Should italicized links be written as <nowiki>''[[The High Republic: Tempest Runner]]'' or [[The High Republic: Tempest Runner|''The High Republic: Tempest Runner'']]</nowiki> ? [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:22, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
****Sorry, should have been more specific. The former is correct. I was just referring to "<nowiki>[[Standard year|year]]s</nowiki>" when I raised the objection. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:27, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
*****Thank you! This has been addressed now [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**You should try to use language more organically when mentioning characters. For example, instead of saying "a Zygerrian Keeper named X," you could just say "the Zygerrian Keeper X."
***Addressed [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**The term "enslaved person" is preferred over "slave," so you could say "the enslaved Twi'lek Lourna Dee" instead. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 14:17, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
***Rewrote to use preferred term throughout the article [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 21:44, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
****Excellent. I'll continue the review within a few days' time. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:45, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Please make sure the image file links are ordered like so: <nowiki>[[File_name|thumb|location|size|caption]]</nowiki>. The size field should look something like "150px"</s>
**Addressed [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 17:04, 17 April 2022 (UTC) 
*<s>"Afterward" is preferred to "Afterwards" in formal writing</s>
**Fixed [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 17:04, 17 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is there a reason why one part of the "Powers and abilities" section is sourced to the audio drama while another part is sourced to the script?</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 14:02, 17 April 2022 (UTC)
**What exactly Dal does when he uses the Force is only explicitly stated in the script. I updated the sourcing in the biography section to reflect this. [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 17:04, 17 April 2022 (UTC)
***Ah, cool, that makes sense. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:17, 17 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Ecks Dee=====
*<s>I'm finding the Biography to be excessively play-by-play in some parts. In general, one should be very careful about prose-ifying dialogue. "''After Kroleyic was incapacitated by Rancisis using the Force, Azim ran to check on Dee, asking if she could stand. After she said she could, Azim introduced himself and his master, telling her that they were there to help.''" This could be written far more concisely: "''After Kroleyic was incapacitated by Rancisis using the Force, Azim ran to check on Dee, introducing himself and his master and telling her that they were there to help.''" No need to recount individual lines of a conversation. Please go through the entire Biography and see if there are instances where you can shorten down parts like this a bit.</s> [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 17:22, 4 May 2022 (UTC)
**I smoothed some things out. However, I think that the focus on dialogue is a side-effect of this article being based off material from an audio drama and only really having dialogue to go off of for events. [[User:Panther436|Panther436]] ([[User talk:Panther436|talk]]) 02:23, 5 May 2022 (UTC)
***Looks much better now. [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 12:49, 6 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Hi, I'm Immi Thrax=====
*<s>Right now, the article closes very abruptly without transition; the last paragraph jumps from a comment on his original casting to saying he reprised in the sequel and then he died. Some possible questions to help this be less abrupt: What has been said about his role in KOTOR 2? Did any of his SW collaborators or the SW social media have anything to say about his legacy upon his passing? [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 06:41, 20 July 2022 (UTC)</s>
**I don't think there's a way to get around it, I've scoured the net for everything you've suggested [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 07:40, 20 July 2022 (UTC)
***It looks like he had an Insider interview published around the time of the game releases (''"In an interview about the Star Wars radio series published in 2004"'') or between them? The mention of that interview is only during the radio section. It makes sense to keep the material about the radio production where it is, but it could help with the abruptness of "KOTOR, KOTOR2, death" to put a mention of that interview where it fits chronologically. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 05:09, 23 July 2022 (UTC)
****I've added a mention of the interview but I'm not sure that it totally solves your issue, given that it precedes KOTOR 2
*<s>I think it's worth (briefly) touching on how he and [[Mark Hamill]] both contributed voices to many of the same projects, even though they didn't overlap on Star Wars specifically. To help with identifying those, here are [https://www.imdb.com/search/title/?roles=nm0000799,nm0000434 IMDB search results] where they are both listed. Mark was photographed with Ed at the latter's 90th birthday and celebrity roast, so he may well have had something to say about Ed that's worth noting. [[User:Immi Thrax|<font style="color:#fc008f; font-weight:bold; font-style:italic;">Immi Thrax</font>]] [[File:RainbowRebellion2.png|20px|link=Wookieepedia:WookieeProject_Pride]] (she/her) [[User_talk:Immi_Thrax|(talk)]] 04:50, 23 July 2022 (UTC)</s>
**There's a pop culture obsessed part of me that wants to document this, but it might need some wider reflection/discussion on the function of our OOU articles in relation to where we draw the line about cast and crew members association with fellow SW actors. Are notable collaborations/friendships totally in line with our purview as a ''Star Wars'' wiki? And are we only interested in them if they involve highly relevant actors like Mark Hamill, Asner was also friendly with [[Ed Begley, Jr.]] [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 09:21, 23 July 2022 (UTC)

=====Samonic=====

=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Context needed for Luke, Obi-Wan, Chewie, Han, and Kenobi.
*What's the need for the "final-page illustration only" note?
*Missing external links section.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 19:19, 9 March 2022 (UTC)
**Context: Added.
**So, at the very end of the book there's one last page that says "And a new journey was about to begin for R2-D2 and C-3PO," featuring a poster-style illustration with Leia, Luke, Han, Chewbacca, Vader, the Death Star, and some starfighters. Nobody on the page is mentioned by name and none of them is featured anywhere else in the story, which is why I think a previous editor included the "final-page illustration only" note. If you would like me to remove it, I can. I don't feel strongly about it one way or another.
**External links was there, just hiding underneath the multimedia template. I've reordered it to fit the proper MOS guidelines. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 20:58, 12 March 2022 (UTC)
***That'll do it :P [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:20, 20 March 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braie=====
*<s>The article talks about Vos leading a campaign on Kashyyyk prior to the Battle of Kashyyyk. It feels notable enough for an article to me, unless there's already an article you can link?</s>
**The source doesn't treat that as different from the [[Battle of Kashyyyk]], I've reworded to better reflect that. --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 21:49, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
***I still don't see how the article doesn't differentiate the two from each other. I'd either link the Battle of Kashyyyk earlier, or create an article that actually covers this campaign. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:36, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
****Done --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 17:57, 15 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''Following the failed assassination attempt on Master Yoda by Clone Commander CC-1004 "Gree" of the 41st Elite Corps and Clone Captain "Jek" of the Ranger Corps, Commander Faie was able to quickly regroup the Republic forces and secured a final victory.''" First of all, clarification of what the victory was over (the Jedi or the Separatists) would be beneficial. And secondly, I think it should be mentioned that Gree and Jek were killed so the reader can better understand why Faie took up the job of regrouping the forces.</s>
**The source doesn't specify what the final victory was, and added --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 21:49, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
***Well we know that the battle was between the Republic and the Separatists, and looking at Linwodo's article, it's suggested that the regrouping led to his defeat. I think both factors should be reflected. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:36, 9 April 2022 (UTC)
****Reworded and added a bit more context per ''Battles that Changed the Galaxy''. Let me know if it needs further adjustment. --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 17:52, 15 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''Vos' fate became unknown.''" From Vader issue 7 (2017 series), we know that Vos was presumed to have survived by the Empire. I think that should be added on.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 18:56, 5 April 2022 (UTC)
**Added --[[User:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Vitus Infinitus</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Vitus Infinitus|<b><span style="color: black">Talk</span></b>]]</sup> 21:49, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''and was joined by Jedi Grand Master Yoda from Coruscant and Jedi General Quinlan Vos from Boz Pity in 19 BBY.''" The wording makes it unclear whether the locations are their last place of operations, their home bases or even their homeworlds. Considering where Quinlan Vos and Yoda came from is not that much relevant to Faie, unless he's serving under one of their units, I just say it's better to remove those altogether (and it saves you having to give them context :P).</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 17:56, 16 April 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>"Felucian medical station" is just a descriptor; it's not a formal name, so it doesn't need to be specifically stated. This applies to the intro, Description, BTS, and Sources sections.</s>
**Well that's irritating, but fine.
*<s>"''thus became involved in a skirmish on the surface against the pirate Hondo Ohnaka and his gang, who were attempting to raid Felucian farmers of their harvest of nysillin crops. Following their successes in repelling Ohnaka and his pirates''" &mdash; This part isn't entirely relevant to the medical station. You can probably just shorten this to say that they had to repel Hondo Ohnaka's pirate gang without expanding on it any further.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 10:30, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

**How's that?
*<s>Per the article text, the station's name is always supposed to be used with the definite article, right? *******Imperators II created different pages for them. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:42, 14 May 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The "Area" information is infobox-exclusive.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 05:42, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
**Fixed --[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 10:57, 17 April 2022 (UTC)
***They are now italicized in the body but not in the infobox. Which way is correct? [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 18:09, 21 April 2022 (UTC)
****That seems to be how it's done on other Force power pages --[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 08:20, 23 April 2022 (UTC)
*****Is there a satus precedent for this? I can't find it. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 17:52, 1 May 2022 (UTC)
******There are no status precedent for this, it's either infobox-exclusive or missing the Force power classification altogether ----[[User:Goodmind|Goodmind]] ([[User talk:Goodmind|talk]]) 13:46, 4 May 2022 (UTC)
*******If the source italicizes them, then they should be italicized in both the body and the infobox, otherwise they shouldn't be italicized in either. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 08:05, 14 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Locations within a location need not be listed in a planet's infobox.</s>
**Removed.
*<s>Man-made locations in the body go under Locations, not Description, which is for natural formations.</s>
**Moved.
*Reviewing note: [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Freerock?type=revision&diff=11715750&oldid=11602524 Please see] how the ndash should be implemented. Only compound words need an ndash, otherwise use a normal hyphen. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 09:29, 24 September 2022 (UTC)
**Huh, I was going off of [[Wookieepedia:Comprehensive article nominations/Roderick%27s#OOM|this]].
***Because "New Republic" is a compound term and therefore "ex-New Republic" needs an ndash, while something like "ex-Imperial" does not. Hope that makes sense. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 18:29, 30 September 2022 (UTC)
****That does, thanks. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 08:29, 1 October 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Too much play-by-play in the History, which is supposed to be about the planet rather than a character's biography.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 10:39, 24 September 2022 (UTC)
**How does this look? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:44, 30 September 2022 (UTC)
***Fine by me, other ACs might have something to say though. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 18:34, 30 September 2022 (UTC)

====Support====

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*"''in Cloud City on the gas giant''" given Cloud City is floating, I don't think ''on'' is the best terminology here.
**Fixed.
*"''where Galactic Republic fighters had tried and failed to defend themselves from the Empire''" If the Empire exists by that point, I think it should be reworded to note that the Republic technically doesn't exist anymore.
**Fixed.
*"''It was then that the doors to the dining room opened, and Gersolik tried to reach for the access panel to the room, only to be stopped by Sbazzle.''" Is this meant to be the bit where Han, Leia and co. run into Vader? There should be some context for this.
*I think that the intro is too short of detail {{C|[https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/836662088998977638/883815620741836831/Picture1.png and a bit short for the word count]}}. Stuff like Lando bringing the two chefs into a meeting, the theorizing of poisoning methods, and the stuff that happens in the final bio paragraph (besides her being furious) should be mentioned in there in my opinion. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 13:45, 18 June 2022 (UTC)
**Okay, I see what you're saying in terms of word count, but I disagree that the level of detail needs to be finer (at the end of the day I'm going over the WC anyway so it doesn't really matter though). [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family: 'Copperplate Gothic', copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 14:16, 19 June 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ACapproved|18:35, 12 April 2022 (UTC)}}
The discrepancy in the article has unfolded a bit more and I don't have the time to totally try to resolve it right now, and I'd like to get some other input first anyway. 
*"''he conspired with Iaco Stark and Hask of the Trade Federation to engineer a profitable bacta shortage''&hellip;" - Adol Bel's encyclopedia entry that I only just thought to check
*"''He formed an alliance with Adol Bel of the Xucphra Corporation, and developed a plan to starve the Old Republic of bacta and reap huge profits. The plans were thwarted by Iaco Stark, whose Commercial Combine began raiding the few bacta convoys leaving Thyferra, then reselling the bacta at cheaper prices.''" - Hask's encyclopedia entry
*"''The bacta thefts were a ruse cooked up between Stark and the Trade Federation's viceroy''" - The Essential Atlas p. 140, admittedly a little different to what I had recorded in the BTS at this time so my bad.
My thinking is that the best way to resolve this is to assume that Stark was involved in the bacta shortage on Thyferra but that he went rogue after that. I don't think there's anyway to rationalize the Atlas's statements given that the comic depicts an attack on a bacta transport clearly. Additionally the article has said that Hask was the viceroy prior to The Essential Guide to Warfare's publication, so I might acknowledge that in the BTS [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 13:32, 4 April 2022 (UTC)
*Article now includes this info [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 10:16, 6 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Erebus=====
*<s>Just curious, is there a reason why the date for the Yavin evacuation isn't included?</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 04:59, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
**Because for all we know those routes could have been charted at any point between the Battle of Yavin and the evacuation six months later, and I feel like saying "after the Battle of Yavin of 0 BBY" would be redundant. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:10, 13 April 2022 (UTC)
***Fair enough. [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 16:25, 13 April 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>The detailed recount of Kenobi's message isn't necessary, especially when Paddie isn't getting a mention in that second paragraph.</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 04:24, 14 August 2022 (UTC)

I wouldn't usually go into this much detail but given how pivotal this message is in the entire saga I think it's worth including that this guy was one of the first people to learn about what would ultimately lead to the Clone Wars. =====Spooky=====
*<s>The intro and description seem to have a lot of really short, choppy sentences. Mind giving it a one-over for flow?</s>
**Sure thing, how about that? [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 06:11, 17 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>It might be nice to specify that the bounty salad starfruit was a part of is a variant of the [[covado salad]], tie in the quote a bit better contextually.</s>
**Okay [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 06:11, 17 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Technically, the fact that it was served in restaurants is intro-specific, as when Dex's Diner is mentioned, it's for Dex's context and not to say the establishment itself served it.</s>
**Is that better (in the intro)? [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 06:11, 17 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Would it suit to list [[Herd ship's bounty salad]] under dishes in the infobox?</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 16:10, 8 March 2022 (UTC)
**Eh, I don't know. Starfruit was just the garnish on that salad, not an essential ingredient. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 06:11, 17 March 2022 (UTC)
***In doing a bit of research, it seems that the current precedent for food articles is that garnishes, and all ingredients that can be found, should be listed under dishes. Minor ingredients being added as an overall case can be seen in a lot of these older Dex's CAs, but also in more recent precedent such as [[Topato stew]], which does add the bits referred to as garnish.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 00:48, 18 March 2022 (UTC)
****Okay, I added that, and the crème [[Liqueur/Legends|liqueur]] from the ''Gem of Alderaan'' thing. [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 05:04, 19 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Manoof=====
*<s>I hate to do this but I think this needs to be split between two articles based on the gem campaign: [[Starfruit]] and [[Ithorian starfruit]], a type of starfruit. Reason being is that the gem campaign is worded such that the recipe there is a specific variety of starfruit, being Ithorian. The other mentions from what I can see don't specify this because it's insinuated by surrounding context to be Ithorian variety&mdash;Tiny death star has it in the Ithorian section, Obi-wan notes it specifically as Ithorian and Jettster mentions it in the context of Ithorian originated recipe. This could also explain the discrepancy in Betrayal if it isn't specified to be an Ithorian starfruit? Happy for others to weigh in especially ACs... [[User:Manoof|Manoof]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> ([[User_talk:Manoof|talk]]) 13:34, 9 April 2022 (UTC)</s>

What if this page were just named Ithorian starfruit? Would that solve the "issues?" [[User:Jade Moonstroller|Jade Moonstroller]] ([[User talk:Jade Moonstroller|talk]]) 02:26, 11 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Imp=====
*<s>The planet itself was not known as the dregs of the Deep Core; it was located ''in'' the dregs of the Deep Core. And that descriptor isn't from dialogue, so it should not be put in quotes.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:11, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  12:37, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
***Please don't forget the fix the intro, as well. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 15:18, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
****Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  15:50, 5 August 2022 (UTC)
*****The ''cause'' for Kalist's surroundings being known as the dregs of the Deep Core is pure speculation on your part, please amend that.
******Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  01:03, 8 August 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The mention of humans is infobox-exclusive.</s>
*<s>Please explicitly note in the Description the planet's short name version, correctly referencing both forms.</s>
*<s>Please cut from the intro the unnecessary astrographical details concerning the Interior and the grid square, and instead add a mention of Kalist VI being the homeworld of Dak Ralter.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:30, 6 August 2022 (UTC)
**Adressed. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  01:03, 8 August 2022 (UTC)
***When I say "correctly reference" I mean do not source the full name to the TFA Beginner's Game, which, as can be seen by the infobox image, doesn't use the full name. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 09:59, 8 August 2022 (UTC)
****TFABG was a mistake, I fixed the reference. [[User:AmazinglyCool|<span style="color: #721472">'''AmazinglyCool'''</span>]] [[File:CIS roundel.svg|15px]] [[User talk:AmazinglyCool|<span>('''talk''')</span>]]  11:47, 8 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Spooky=====
*<s>By composition, could milk be considered an animal based ingredient?</s>
**Hmm, I've always considered that field for meats only but actually based on the title it can include animal products like egg or milk. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:08, 3 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Would [[:Category:Milk]] suit?</s>
**I also discussed this with Luca on Discord and my reasoning for not including it is that I see that category as for natural milks from different species rather than milk-based beverages. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:08, 3 April 2022 (UTC)
***Fair point.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 07:11, 3 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Similarly to how the spiced rolls article does, would it be worth establishing they share their name with the Keshian species?</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 03:00, 3 April 2022 (UTC)
**I'd considered the link to Keshian enough, but I've added a line for more specificity. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:08, 3 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>The way you start off the bio right now doesn't quite work. You need to reintroduce the subject (i.e., "Kni was a Duros male..."), since the intro is separate from the body.
*Why are you linking "Sith [[Fleet/Legends|Fleet]]" like that? Do we really not have an article for it?</s>
*(Review note) No space goes after references' = sign. (<nowiki><ref name="KOTOR" />, not <ref name= "KOTOR" /></nowiki>) [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 15:50, 15 February 2022 (UTC)
**Added a reintroduction and fixed the reference formatting errors. As for the "Sith Fleet", I don't think [[Imperial Navy (Sith Empire)|this article]] pertains to the fleet of Revan's Empire. Given that the "Sith Fleet" is brought up several times in the games, it could probably use its own article.[[File:Jedi Order.svg|x20px]] [[User:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00C68D">'''''ImpacticForce'''''</span>]] <small>[[User talk:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00956A">''(Talk)''</span>]]</small> 13:19, 16 February 2022 (UTC)
***Correction! I found the [[Sith armada (Jedi Civil War)|article]] for the Jedi Civil war sith fleet. I linked it. [[File:Jedi Order.svg|x20px]] [[User:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00C68D">'''''ImpacticForce'''''</span>]] <small>[[User talk:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00956A">''(Talk)''</span>]]</small> 19:33, 16 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Kni's thoughts don't really seem like P+T material to me. Specifically these two lines: "Kni thought that the Galactic Republic was losing the war but to no fault of their own. Having seen the decimation of his planet, he believed the Sith Empire was strong enough to destroy all its enemies."</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:53, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
**As per Discord, integrated into the Biography section.[[File:Jedi Order.svg|x20px]] [[User:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00C68D">'''''ImpacticForce'''''</span>]] <small>[[User talk:ImpacticForce|<span style="color: #00956A">''(Talk)''</span>]]</small> 20:06, 25 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Something weird's going on here, along with a typo: "''While t the Duros's past as a refugee, Kni recognized Revan as a Jedi, and he thanked him and the [[Dantooine Jedi Enclave Council|Enclave's Council]] for allowing him to stay.''"</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 11:53, 21 March 2022 (UTC)

**Tokens, done
*<s>"''This article follows the description of events provided in scenario.''" &mdash; not sure what info exactly is this sentence supposed to convey, because ''every'' article on Wookieepedia is supposed to follow descriptions of events provided in sources where possible. :P</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 10:36, 26 May 2022 (UTC)

**Factually corrected.

**He was in the Oola scene and Luke scene. He wasn't (in universe no confirmation to be seen/present) there when Leia arrived, but that happened in between.
***Rewrote to hopefully make it more clear he was only (confirmed to be) visible/present in the Oola and Luke scenes. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 21:36, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
****I think it'd still be a lot clearer if you just said which scene you meant for the first and second scenes in the BTS. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 12:01, 11 August 2022 (UTC)
*****Rewritten. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 12:44, 11 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan=====

=====Spooky=====
*<s>Is it worth including either [[Government center (Salline)]] or [[Guildhead's Way/Legends|Guildhead's Way]] in the |interest= template field? Seemed to be a primary Imperial objective to take that center of authority out.</s>
*<s>Basing off the precedent of [[Imthitill]] seems like it may suit to have the |location= infobox field as Coastline or similar, since at least part of the city was on the coast, and it was designated as a port overall?</s>
**Both done. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 20:04, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Dating things:</s>
**"As a result, between 2 and O BBY, Salline was occupied by the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Galactic Empire immediately responded..." This reads slightly oddly, as it's saying the Empire immeadiately responded, while just prior saying that it's been occupied for a span of two years, which would make it not so. Perhaps suitable to add some form of 'at some point between' to refer to those years?
***The city wasn't occupied for two years, the occupation occured during that time. Hopefully clarified.
**In doing some cursory research, I noticed that there's [[The Promotion of Lieutenant Veers]] and [[Star Wars: Empire at War]] (which noted on Veers' page as documenting his promotion to Colonel). With those details, it seems like the date for the Salline pacification could be potentially narrowed to at some point between 1 BBY and 0 BBY; as it had to be while he was colonel.
**To that end as well; unless a contradicting source says Veers was a general at the time, the Imperial Handbook has the report as while he's a colonel, which should be reflected in the article's prose.
***Added.
****Seems like the article still reflects that he was a general during the pacification; and the TEA ref registers as broken.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 20:22, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
*****Goddammit I fixed the intro but not the body. Should be good now. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 20:26, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
**Battle of Yavin can be dated.
***Done.
*<s>Would it be worth making an article for Chandrila's Imperial governor mentioned in the History?</s>
**There technically is one. However, I didn't link it as around that time Chandrila was ruled by [[Gerald Weizel]]. Since there's no reason to believe that it was him or someone else, it would be misleading to link it.
*<s>Given Mothma's homeworld is Chandrila and she was to some degree part of it's politics, it might have enough relevance to include the fact that she later obtained a copy of the handbook and wrote said note, so that it also wouldn't have to be linked in the quote caption.</s>
**Done
*<s>Given the article length, the intro could stand to be explanded slightly.</s>
**Done.
*<s>The detail of the Rebels fortifying the government center, if to be included, should precede the mentions of Veers going to attack it&mdash;as it had been done at least by the time he got there.</s>
**Done.
*<s>Was information on who the manual was intended to be distributed to ever noted? 'to its officers' or something, (if it has it; just to check).</s>
**Yes.
*<s>Can Salline being ruled by a governor be sourced to ''Strongholds of Resistance'' or was that reference intended to only specify what Chandrilan House was?</s>
**Apologies, was unclear; Salline itself does not appear to be in SoR itself, given the article only lists the handbook as a source. If SoR says all Chandrilan cities were ruled by a governor part of the Chandrilan House, then a separate ref note should state that since the handbook reveals Salline is a Chandrilan city, it must be ruled by a governor of that body due to the information about such cities in SoR&mdash;rather than just citing it to SoR without context.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 23:48, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
***How's that? [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 00:28, 10 April 2022 (UTC)
**All cities on Chandrila are ruled by a governor.
*<s>I'm not terribly familar with ''Legends'' precedent on it but&mdash;should 'Pacification' be capitalized in the intro/quote caption, when referring to [[Pacification of Salline]]? Given that Veer's report titling is in all caps, it doesn't seem to indicate that Pacification itself needs to be so (in prose, specifically). Could be wrong on that, but thought to check.</s>
**Seems like a proper name to me.
*<s>I think it's worth noting that Salline was located near an ocean in the description (to specify that it's that rather than a lake/river/other body of water, since those have coastlines).</s>
**noted
*<s>It says hit by missile batteries&mdash;unless mentioned elsewhere, I'm not sure batteries would be accurate to say, as it's not in Veers' report, and doesn't resemble [[Missile Battery]] or anything closely.</s>
**The text specifically says missile batteries. I can send you the image on Discord if you want.
*<s>Seems like you're missing some varying links; I nicked a few, but it might be worth going over it again.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 06:29, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
**Looks fine to me. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 20:04, 8 April 2022 (UTC)

**Hmm, working on it

====Object====
=====OOM=====
*<s>Good work. My edit [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Virgillia_system/Legends?curid=18627&diff=11288669&oldid=11287677 here]. Just a few things:</s>
*<s>Two [[Wikipedia:Dangling modifier|dangling participles]] in the intro:</s>
**"''the site of a civil war between the Aristocracy and the Virgillian Free Alignment, which began'' [&hellip;]"
**"''The conflict eventually became a proxy war between the Empire and the Rebel Alliance, which the Alliance-backed Free Alignment ultimately won''"
*<s>[[WP:MOS]]: "''A subject should be linked once upon its first mention in the article's infobox, once upon its first mention in the article's intro, and once upon its first mention in the article's main body.''" &mdash; there is a duplicate link for [[Galactic Republic/Legends]]. Similarly, [[HoloNet News/Legends]] doesn't need to be linked twice in the quotes.</s>
*<s>It would be nice to vary the use of language and space out repeated words; the last several paragraphs all use the word "after," but the synonym "subsequently" only appears once.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:52, 2 March 2022 (UTC)
**How's [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Virgillia_system/Legends?type=revision&diff=11289157&oldid=11288669 this]? I also swapped the quotes because I think it reads better that way, if that's alright. [[User:Dropbearemma|Dropbearemma]] ([[User talk:Dropbearemma|talk]]) 06:31, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
***Looks good. After speaking with Imp, I've changed the first dangling participle sentence back to how it was, since it reads fine given the context, so apologies for any trouble there. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:49, 3 March 2022 (UTC)
