====Object====
=====Luca=====
*<s>In my understanding, ''Galactic Campaign Guide'' mentions her name and surname but only explains the meaning of her surname. Doesn't this qualify as a mention of the character?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:36, 10 May 2022 (UTC)
**Resolved via Discord. [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:46, 10 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>I realize that the earliest DB entry backup for Tacema that we have is from 2009, but can we be sure the entry was actually only added that year?</s>
*<s>Just to confirm: does ''Galactic Campaign Guide'' really establish that the meaning of Tacema's first name was unknown?</s>
*<s>I'm not seeing why the article needs to exclusively use the alias "Ellorrs Madak" for Ohwun De Maal.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 16:48, 13 May 2022 (UTC)
**I guess we can't confirm an earlier release for the DB entry, so I removed any year. For the second, yes, unknown in the source. For the third, I changed to just the real name. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 17:01, 13 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*Note that I'm not 100% convinced that the CCG showing an edited Ellors Madak image or the Databank saying she's in RotJ make her confirmed to be that film extra, but I asked about it on Discord, and wrote the article the way it is based on answers. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 03:54, 10 April 2022 (UTC)

=====CC-8=====
*<s>Is it possible to find even a rough date for when the two apps were retired?</s> [[User:Commander Code-8|<b><span style="color: Purple">Commander Code-8</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Commander Code-8|<span style="color: Maroon">Hello There!</span>]]</sup> 07:06, 12 April 2022 (UTC)
**I searched far and wide before writing up this article, and gave it another pass now as well. I can't seem to find anything. No news article nor official closure date from Disney. Just that one long Disney Interactive page listing retired apps. There aren't even any wayback machine archives for that page that go back beyond 2019, so we can't even estimate which year they were retired. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 07:25, 19 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The second half of the first bio paragraph doesn't need to operate like an intro, it's a little confusing to see those elements listed there and then have them described later. Same with "Marsham went on to write a single short story for the imprint as a freelancer."</s>
*<s>The citation notes for the work on Galactic Adventures Storybook should all be using {{Tl|Shortstory}}</s>

=====OOM=====
*<s>Preliminaries</s>
**There's a bit of a disconnect in the date ref. You've established the main timeframe of the novel, and that's all fine and dandy, but then it kind of just jumps to saying M2-M5 must have been destroyed at that time as well.
***Does that clarify?
**I've seen it a few times now, so you must just have missed it, but "Twilight Company" falls under the proper compound noun clause in [[WP:MOS#Linking]].
***I'm confused, none of the linking section mention proper nouns. What am I breaking here?
****Specifically, I'm referring to this section "''<nowiki>But do not link individual words within proper compound nouns (examples: [[Death]] [[Star]], [[Color|Azure]] [[Dianoga]] [[Cantina]], [[The galaxy|Galactic]] Empire, ''[[Bantha]]''-class assault shuttle)''</nowiki>" [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:34, 26 March 2022 (UTC)
*****Ah, fixed. That's something I'll need to stop doing for all BTC articles :P [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:21, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
**"''explaining the matter to First Sergeant Hazram Namir when the pair talked about the issue''" &mdash; the "talked about the issue" seems to be redundant to "explaining the matter." Can we do without it?
***Removed.
**Those two images have been used on like a dozen status articles by now, but I'm not complaining :P However, that first image's caption is a complete sentence as well.
***Blame the lack of BTC related images :(. I'm never gonna get the hang of image caption punctuation.
**"''Namir told him to send a full report to Captain Micha Evon about the problem''" &mdash; a bit of a disconnect here too, since there is no apparent link between this and the previous lines. To better convey the flow of events, I would use a word like "thus" here.
***How does that look?
**There's a few missing links, so it'd be great if you could spot them while addressing the other issues. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:55, 25 March 2022 (UTC)
***Did a sweep of the intro and bio. Hopefully got them all. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 19:09, 26 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>Equipment unsourced.</s>
**Added [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 07:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"Jez and Lan didn't think our parents would agree, but I talked 'em into it." -Mazi. It refers to them as friends before this, but consistenly as 'brothers' after Han learns this information, and since Mazi refers to them as ''our'' parents, can they be established as brothers?</s>
**You know what... I'm stunned I didn't catch on to this before. Now it makes complete sense that the three of them were brothers. I've edited the article to reflect this. Nice catch! [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 07:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC) 
*<s>Han does establish that "The oldest couldn't be more than fifteen, if that." That can give some dating context to when they were born, even if it's a bit of a range.</s>
**Added in P&T [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 07:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>The text does describe his skin shade as pale, which can be added.</s>
**Added description on a new line. [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 07:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>It's mentioned one of the garments he was wearing has pockets (which he stuffed credits into). A small detail, but one that can be mentioned in equipment.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 15:53, 9 March 2022 (UTC)
**I feel like that's pushing equipment too far. Sorry, do we have any other GA's that does this too? [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 07:23, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
***Hmm, the main reason I mentioned it is because, having an occupation as a thief, it'd make sense if the pickpocketer had garments that had pockets, which it notes him to have. I did find some examples that list the pockets/pouches (and sometimes colors of) within FAs: [[Krix]], [[Ruescott Melshi]], [[Moroff]]) '''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 18:57, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
****Appreciate you taking the time to explain and provide samples. I've added a link for clothing since there wasn't a specific one for pants. [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 11:05, 31 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''Mazi was a Human male who lived on...''" - It might be better to establish that Mazi's homeworld is Alderaan in the prose earlier then when it gets linked way down in the skills section. I'm aware the photo caption does say that, but the body itself only says he lived on Alderaan.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 18:57, 19 March 2022 (UTC)
**Good point. I've moved the link. Let me know if the wording is ok. [[User:ToRsO bOy|ToRsO bOy]] ([[User talk:ToRsO bOy|talk]]) 11:05, 31 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>It seems like there's enough content notability to make articles for, then link&mdash;the memorial hosted (as an event), the memorial's chamber as a location, and Organa's mission to Delaya (probably pipelinked to 'visit'), and his mother (the one mentioned in Lan's top quote).</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 02:39, 7 April 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*How do we know this isn't the same as a [[memory bank]]? [[User:Mr Star Wars AminoRepublic|Mr Star Wars AminoRepublic]] ([[User talk:Mr Star Wars AminoRepublic|talk)]] 23:08, 4 March 2022 (UTC)
**We don't, it would be speculating to assume its the same. I would assume the memory "logs" are what are stored in a memory "bank" but no source has established that yet  [[User:Editoronthewiki|Editoronthewiki]] ([[User talk:Editoronthewiki|talk]]) 18:09, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
*Since [[B1-series battle droid]]s are also used in the [[Confederacy of Independent Systems Navy]] coupled with the current wording, would it be appropriate to say that memory logs were used by the Confederacy military as a whole instead of just the Separatist Droid Army? [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 05:06, 3 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Ecks=====
*<s>This is a bit of a run-on sentence, particularly with the two "since" clauses. See if you can split it up. "''At that point, since—unlike the RST model droids—the protocol droids available in the wider galaxy were capable of not just translating but also interpreting cultural nuances, and since by that time the RST models had caused numerous problems during important government functions due to being highly susceptible to electromagnetic pulses, the Mephout-designed translator droids were rapidly replaced by protocol droids.''"</s> [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 13:29, 12 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Dionne=====
*<s>"&hellip;Qilori of Uandualon, whose talents with Third Sight&hellip;" Doesn't Qilori call his ability "Great Presence" instead of "Third Sight"? The source is of course the same, the Force, just the differences of terminology.</s>--[[User:Dionne Jinn|Dionne Jinn]] ([[User talk:Dionne Jinn|talk]]) 16:18, 24 January 2022 (UTC)
**Good catch! Fixed -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link= User:YakovChaimTzvi]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 17:30, 25 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I've been thinking about that last paragraph of the intro. Would it flow better if you started with something like "During the mission J C Thrawn noticed that Lioaoi ships present bore a resemblance to pirates, who had recently been attacking&hellip;"?</s>--[[User:Dionne Jinn|Dionne Jinn]] ([[User talk:Dionne Jinn|talk]]) 18:12, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
**Better now? -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link= User:YakovChaimTzvi]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 19:45, 26 January 2022 (UTC)
***Yep.--[[User:Dionne Jinn|Dionne Jinn]] ([[User talk:Dionne Jinn|talk]]) 19:52, 26 January 2022 (UTC)

====="This is a counselor ship. We're on a&mdash;"=====
*<s>The bold says it's a "diplomatic mission" but the title just says calls it by "mission." I'm pretty sure the entirety of the bold is meant to represent part of a conjectural title, so either the name of the article should have diplomatic there to reflect the bold, or vice versa.</s>
**Addressed this. -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 00:34, 21 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Context for Lioaoin Regime, Guild Concourse 447, Navigators' Guild, Pesfavri, Schesa, and Lioaoin heartworld.</s>
** I got the first three, but have to do Pesfavri, Schesa, and Lioaoin heartworld later. -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 00:50, 25 February 2022 (UTC)
***The regime still has no context in the Mission section. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 13:10, 26 February 2022 (UTC)

*****Check my [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Mission_to_Bardram_Scoft?diff=11281550&oldid=11281519 copy-edit] is all good. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 02:00, 27 February 2022 (UTC)
*<s>In the intro and body, you introduce the Lioaoin cruiser before introducing the Lioaoin Regime, which bears enough significance to be introduced simultaneously. I think you should introduce them as "cruisers of the Lioaoin Regime" to convey that better.</s>
**I rechecked the chapter. I didn't actually see confirmation that the Lioaoi ships were Lioaoin cruisers, so I removed it. -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 00:50, 25 February 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*For the quotetrans speak things (I don't know what you call them), there's specific code for them like with the ellipses and dashes (pretend there's a ; at the end of each because nowiki doesn't work) &raquo (&raquo;) and &laquo (&laquo;). [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 20:47, 15 February 2022 (UTC)

=====Fan=====
*<s>[[Standard decade]] should be linked in the intro.</s>
**Fixed
*<s>I think you can cut down on all the alternative ways to referr to IG-88 and Moggee in the second paragraph of the intro. Using their names a few times more would be less awkward to read.</s> 
**Fixed
*<s>You can use "they" to refer to them as well if their gener isn't specified. Avoiding makes the article awkward to read.</s>
**Fixed
***"But when IG-88 followed after Moggee, the droid discovered a piece a metal on the ground and instead played a trick on Moggee." The second Moggee should be replaced by the word "them" IMO '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 04:26, 18 January 2022 (UTC)
****Fixed.--[[User:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #FF0000">'''Liverpool'''</span>]][[User talk:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #JJ0000">'''92'''</span>]][[File:Ackbar HS.jpg|x20px]] 02:46, 21 January 2022 (UTC)

**Fixed--[[User:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #FF0000">'''Liverpool'''</span>]][[User talk:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #JJ0000">'''92'''</span>]][[File:Ackbar HS.jpg|x20px]] 03:49, 17 January 2022 (UTC)
**Make sure to use they/them since their gender isn't specified. Avoiding pronoun usage makes it very awkward to read. '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 04:26, 18 January 2022 (UTC)
***Fixed I think. Sorry about that.--[[User:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #FF0000">'''Liverpool'''</span>]][[User talk:Liverpool92|<span style="color: #JJ0000">'''92'''</span>]][[File:Ackbar HS.jpg|x20px]] 02:01, 19 January 2022 (UTC)
****It should be noted for the record that using they/them for unspecified gender is optional and not required by policy. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:50, 10 February 2022 (UTC)

**The intro is a little too long for an article of this size. It's got too much detail as well. One paragraph would do fine here.

***He planned to do it. Specified that

**Any reason why CR-8R told this story that perhaps would be relevant to the actions of Moggee?
***CR-8R tells the story to Graf to teach him to have patience.

=====Erebus is back=====
*<s>When mentioning characters more than once, we refrain from using their first name, only when they don't have a last name. There is one in the article.</s>
*<s>You are currently using ref 2 consecutively in the body. It should only be used once, ending at 20 BBY in the first paragraph.</s>
*<s>Clone Wars context is not necessary in the intro.</s>
*Did Savage throw Morley onto the fire in anger? I seem to remember that he choked him for betraying him, but just threw him onto the fire.
*<s>Morley's name should be mentioned in Skills and abilities.</s>
*<s>The BTS needs to include the full release date for [[Brothers]], as well as episode number, season number and that it's a TCW episode. However, it is irrelevant to mention that he appeared in Revival in a flashback. That is from a time long gone.</s> [[User:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">Erebus Chronus</span></b>]] <sup>[[User talk:Erebus Chronus|<b><span style="color:#3e236e">(Talk)</span></b>]]</sup> 17:28, 13 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Braha=====
*(Preliminaries) <s>The class ''Terrapin'' should be italicised.</s>
*<s>For chronology purposes, you should introduce Morley finding Maul, Maul being his master and him feeding Maul before you get to Savage arriving.
*Bouncing off the objection above, I think it's also worth contextualising how Maul ended up there.</s>
**[https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Morley?diff=11579157&oldid=11577431 This] is the ideal set up for the chronology. If Morley found Maul before Savage came, then that should be mentioned beforehand. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:51, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Savage and Maul's context should mention they're Dathomirian and Force-sensitive, so that later elements don't confuse the reader.
*Context for Fire-Breathers?
*"''While Opress slashed through most of the native scavengers,''" Linking lightsaber to slashed isn't enough to say that Savage used a lightsaber on them, you should actually state it.</s>
**Watch out for capitalization. The episode has fire-breathers as lowercase, and it appears to be Morley's nickname for refuse incinerator droid as well. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:51, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''Morley then claimed to have spotted a horned man like Opress, which made Opress follow the snake-like alien.''" I would recommend referring to Opress in a different variation in the second instance. Additionally, Morley actually said he heard stories about a horn man.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 20:34, 2 July 2022 (UTC)
**Regarding your second and third objection, do we have a canon source for that? I know there is some legends stuff but i don't know of any canon sources.
***Ok, for these two, I feel like there should be some context for Morley working with Maul. In the episode, he states he found Maul and it's established that he brought Maul victims as food and got the leftovers. I think that should at least be the context. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 08:31, 5 July 2022 (UTC)
****Done. [[User:Sicaptain|Sicaptain]] ([[User talk:Sicaptain|talk]]) 22:03, 5 July 2022 (UTC)
**For the fourth one, why is it important that they are force-sensitive? I don't know of any point in the episode where that is important.[[User:Sicaptain|Sicaptain]] ([[User talk:Sicaptain|talk]]) 17:51, 3 July 2022 (UTC)
***Looking back at this one, I not as fussed about it, but I would still like to see something about Maul being a fallen Sith apprentice or something. The Phantom Menace is an easy reference for that. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 08:31, 5 July 2022 (UTC)
****Done. [[User:Sicaptain|Sicaptain]] ([[User talk:Sicaptain|talk]]) 22:03, 5 July 2022 (UTC)
**On a final note, be mindful with tense as well. "Says" is present tense. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:51, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
*(Part two: The biography) I think the bio in general is lacking in details after watching the episode myself. I think you should include the parts when:
**Morley greets Savage only to be stamped on and choked, followed by their conversation.
***Morley introducing himself and the "payment" part are worth mentioning as well.
**<s>Morley's offer is rejected, but he follows Savage and warns him.</s>
**He brings up the fire-breathers, and Savage is forced to follow him to safety.
***"''and Opress had to follow the Anacondan to get to safety''" that's roughly how it goes, but Morley also ''advised'' him to follow.
**Morley warning Savage about the junkers before the fight actually occurs.
***I think there should be a bit more detail than just "Morley was not keen".
**<s>Morley didn't just 'then' claim he knew of someone looking like Savage. That conversation should be detailed better too.
**Morley advising Savage to take shelter before the latter spots one.</s>
**Morley pretending to be surprised by the state of that shelter with the bodies.
***You should also mention Morley's trap at that point rather than when he actually betrays Savage to set up the context for this trap.
**Savage believing he had been betrayed, leading to him step into Morley's trap.
***This part should be detailed a bit more.
**Savage's final questioning of Morley before he kills him. #{{AC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:45, 6 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>The sentence about its color and the peppers is nearly identical in the intro/body. Can we get some variation?
*Isn't all of LOTJ ''in'' 232 BBY, not around? Or is that just the launch?
*Can you split up the quote so that there's one for one of the body sections? Description or History should work.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 03:53, 30 January 2022 (UTC)
**Handled your first and last objections. As for the date, the [[dedication of the Starlight Beacon]] is the only event from ''Light of the Jedi'' given an exact date, in ''[[The Star Wars Book]]''. {{Tl|LightOfTheJediDate}} used to say that more clearly but someone took it off. I'll probably add that detail back in since it makes things clearer. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 04:24, 30 January 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Since the raid specifically happens ''after'' breakfast, how is it relevant to the stew?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:06, 30 January 2022 (UTC)
**I reworded it and hopefully it ties together better now. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 18:14, 30 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Spooky=====
*<s>I see that the sw.com article has a different capitalization for the stew, might that be BtS notable?</s>
*<s>Was there any other mention of charhounds consuming the stew other than: "The hound was no fool—of all the Jedi of Elphrona, Bell Zettifar was by far the most likely to slip her a bite or two during meals." in ''Light of the Jedi''? If my skim didn't pick it up then that'd be my bad, but I couldn't seem to find anything else in the stew's scenes, and this specifies the hound was fed but not what it was fed, or if it was stew.</s>
*<s>The stew had a thick consistency, could be served with a ladle, and prepared in a kitchen - which can be added to the body, and the thick mention to the infobox as well as a physical descriptor.</s>
*<s>Is Indeera actually shown consuming the stew? After reviewing the one quote about her and Bell going to meet for breakfast meal, it's not clear whether they'd just known Bell liked it and let him know about it being made for the meal. Unless there's another mention elsewhere, seems like an assumption to say it's consumable by their species when not shown.</s>
*<s>The intro indicates that the stew was ''regularly'' served for meals such as breakfast. Similarly to above, while it can be said it was made for said meal once, what indication of it being a recurring part of breakfast would there be? If there is the context somewhere though, it would be intro exclusive at present.</s>
*<s>Might be nitpicky, but does "favorite" pinpoint Bell's thoughts on the stew? From the mentions I see there's really only one scene where he is seen to actually consume it, but the article implies that it quickly became a favorite part of meal (implying recurring servings) when the relating quote seems to point at him being a fan of the chef's cooking overall. He's certainly shown to enjoy it, but the article also states he "usually" ate two bowls of it when served. I'm not sure that's the best to use either unless missing a mention, as he could've just been hungry that particular day, and not enough to establish it as a usual.</s>
*<s>Greatstorm's scenes in ''The Rising Storm'' reflect that he had smelled the stew before, but not that he had ever consumed it (in relation to the article's mentions of his species finding it consumable).</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 03:03, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
**It's implied that Bell has slipped Ember stew before; she reacts to him asking for more of it.
**Added a note about the consistency. The ladle and kitchen stuff is far too generic to be worth mentioning.
**Removed the stuff about it being edible to Tholothians, as you are correct that the scene does not mention if she had any.
**Removed "regularly".
**Being a favourite of Bell's is implied; the scene makes it clear he really likes it. Cleaned up the other stuff.
**Loden is stated to have an empty bowl in ''Light of the Jedi'', indicating that he ate the stew. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 03:13, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
**Added the capitalization detail; nearly forgot about it. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 03:19, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
***Was there any other mention of the hound regarding stew? If the mentioned quote is the only one, while it could considered as an assumption, the quote only implies that the hound was accustomed to recieving a form of food scraps/bites from Bell during meals. I don't think it's implied that Ember has specifically had this stew before/is able to consume it, given the surrounding context notes that a few of the Jedi took turns caring for the hound in varying ways, including feeding, since they had met.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:24, 13 March 2022 (UTC)
****Removed it. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 05:44, 13 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*There is a mention of the stew in ''Rising Storm'' at the start of chapter 22, not sure if you think it will require an update but letting you know [[User:Lewisr|Lewisr]] ([[User talk:Lewisr|talk]]) 21:35, 21 February 2022 (UTC)
**Thanks! Article's been updated. [[User:SilverSunbird|SilverSunbird]] ([[User talk:SilverSunbird|talk]]) 21:41, 21 February 2022 (UTC)
***No worries! [[User:Lewisr|Lewisr]] ([[User talk:Lewisr|talk]]) 21:46, 21 February 2022 (UTC)

#{{AC}} [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 21:19, 24 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Spooky=====
*<s>Is it worth noting the climate as cold in the infobox?</s>
*<s>"..in order to open a vacancy for an Imperial Military figure to be promoted to from the Kuat Drive Yards." I see the the wording "to be promoted to" in the intro, but upon reading it became confusing as to what they'd be promoted ''to''. I'm assuming it means to have someone transferred there, but perhaps the sentence could be slightly tweaked; to have that third 'to' removed or something otherwise, not sure.</s>
**Both addressed.
*<s>From a novel spot-search of Rimma I came up with: "Governor Chalis and her infantry company were striking soft targets along the Rimma Trade Route..."; if they're doing the campaign along the route, would it be fair to say that it could be added to |routes=, and have the 'along' reflected in the body? Seems like with their sights set on eventually Sullust they're going down the route and attacking places, rather than just being near it.</s>
**Now this is something I've gone back and forth from, and I'll explain why. When I went to look at the placing of targets that were more established in Canon, I found that while Sullust was on the Rimma, Xagobah was along a small route just off of it. Meaning "along the Rimma" isn't entirely accurate. It also comes to say that Chalis said "indirect route" in her proposal of Operation Ringbreaker. Thus I have made the decision to take "along the Rimma" with a grain of salt as I have done with all the Ringbreaker targets without proper mapping. If Xagobah is only near the route then other targets could be the same.
***Ah, I see; thanks for the explanation.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 20:09, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Perhaps [[:Category:Oceanic moons]]?</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:09, 8 April 2022 (UTC)
**Added. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:19, 8 April 2022 (UTC)

=====Macaroni=====

**Voila. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:08, 20 April 2022 (UTC)

[[User:DFaceG|DFaceG]] ([[User talk:DFaceG|talk]]) 18:45, 25 April 2022 (UTC)
***After the input gotten from when asked in Discord, it seems that the MOS states that the captions should not have periods at the end, and that other precedent would have the captions be presented in present tense. With the removal of the periods, that would solve my issue of them being sentence-like.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 19:23, 25 April 2022 (UTC)

[[Nim Pianna]] comes to mind; can pull other examples if you'd like.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 19:23, 25 April 2022 (UTC)

As [[Tallisibeth Enwandung-Esterhazy|Enwandung-Esterhazy]] having assisted Chizzik in practicing the knots is described as having occurred prior to the events of the novel, it must have occurred by 19 [[Galactic Standard Calendar|BBY]]."</s>

=====CC-8=====
*<s>Tallisibeth's last name is hyphenated, so "Enwandung-Esterhazy" needs to be used each time she is mentioned</s>

=====I sense something; a presence I've not felt since&hellip;=====
*<s>Review note: "''during the Clone Wars fought between the Galactic Republic and <u>the</u> Confederacy of Independent Systems''" is the preferred wording, emphasis mine.</s>
*<s>Review note: while I removed this part as part of my copy-edit, "''the Twi'lek's flagship''" &mdash; it wouldn't hurt to repeat "the ''Liberty''" here. Plus, readers might not get the hint that Secura was a Twi'lek.</s>
*<s>Gonna have to ask you to shorten "Confederacy of Independent Systems" and "T-series military strategic analysis and tactics droid," given the wordiness of the intro and the fact that their full, formal titles aren't relevant.</s>
*<s>I don't believe the "''from across the galaxy''" tidbit is relevant.</s>
*<s>"''Skywalker launched from his flagship in order to board the ''Liberty" &mdash; he launched what? I recommend rewording this to "''Skywalker boarded the ''Liberty."</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:48, 16 May 2022 (UTC)

====Object====

====Comments====
{{ACapproved|06:09, 3 September 2022 (UTC)}}
*Placing this as a comment because the article is in line with precedent in regards to this, but I'd like to request a change in that. ''[[Star Wars: Absolutely Everything You Need to Know, Updated and Expanded]]'' does not explicitly state all [[R2-series astromech droid|R2-series droids]] are .96m (3ft 2in). It only states [[R2-M5]] as that while also stating [[R2-D2]] is 1.09m (3ft 6in), with other sources confirming R2-D2's height. Furthermore, the logic of the X in RX determining the RX-series would suggest [[R2-BHD]] is another R2 that is 1.09m, per the Databank. I think we should either stop applying that droid height to all droids of similair series, or change the reference note to better reflect how we are coming to that conclusion. Additionally, while I think assuming RX-series is a fair assumption, I also think the reference notes should state it is an assumption. I don't see where SWBTMF explicitly states R2-H7 to be one, and I think the reference notes in these situations should reflect that. {{Unsigned|NBDani}}
**Just realized that I should probably actually note here that I'm not ignoring this comment and have spoken to Dani about it. I'm currently trying to figure out a way to test my theory that .96m is R2's height on three legs and 1.09m is the height on two after which I'll implement the new heights referencing across all relevant astromech status articles. [[User:Ayrehead02|Ayrehead02]] ([[User talk:Ayrehead02|talk]]) 07:34, 15 August 2022 (UTC)

=====Zed=====
*<s>Haven't thoroughly read through the whole article currently, but I just wanted to raise a point regarding this line: "''This article assumes that the novelization's version of the lines are in error.''" How do we know that the novelization wasn't intentional in condensing Mar's lines for the purposes of simplification? I feel like it should be presented more neutrally, instead saying that the episode's version takes precedence.</s> [[User:Zed42|<span style="color: #995C8E">'''Zed42'''</span>]] ([[User talk:Zed42|talk]]) 08:03, 27 February 2022 (UTC)
**How does this look? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 09:20, 27 February 2022 (UTC)
***I've just made a minor change, but that's good now. Apologies for such a delay in getting back to you - ongoing computer issues. [[User:Zed42|<span style="color: #995C8E">'''Zed42'''</span>]] ([[User talk:Zed42|talk]]) 07:17, 14 March 2022 (UTC)

*'''Nominated by''': *[[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|talk]])  09:37, 25 January 2022 (UTC)

====Support====

====Object====
=====Fan=====
*<s>[[Video game]] should be linked in intro</s>
*<s>" after their success on Assembly demo party. " the demo party needs a little more context. The way it's currently worded made me assume it was some form of game demo, but the wikipedia link actually shows it as an event.</s>
**"The company was created after their success on the Assembly demo party,[1]the trio won with a multiplayer game called King of the Cabbage World.[6] a Finnish event where gamers and game developers develop and play games in one single place." Two sentence fragments here on the end '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 08:31, 30 January 2022 (UTC)
***Addressed now I believe?  [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 17:42, 30 January 2022 (UTC)
****{{Acstrike|19:58, 17 February 2022 (UTC)}}
*<s>"Rovio received a considerable amount of funds" Any information as to from whom?</s> '''[[User:Fan26|<span style="color:#003">Fan26</span>]]''' (<span style="color:#003">'''[[User talk:Fan26|Talk]]'''</span>) 17:50, 27 January 2022 (UTC)
**Game sales probably, unspecified and no more sources available for the topic. All objections addressed but this one. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|Contact]])  20:37, 27 January 2022 (UTC)

=====Dent=====
*<s>In the intro paragraph, you say the company was founded on November 10, 2003. Please make sure all that information is in the infobox. Right now you just have the year.</s>
*<s>Remove the period after "Espoo, Finland." If something isn't a sentence, it doesn't need a period.</s>
*<s>Espoo, Finland, should be hyperlinked to the relevant Wikipedia page.</s>
*<s>"www." from the official site field in the infobox should be removed.</s>
*<s>The reference notes for Angry Bird Star Wars and Angry Bird Star Wars II both need italicization since they are game titles.</s>
*<s>Please hyperlink "Finnish" in the intro to the relevant Wikipedia page.</s>
*<s>Was the company originally founded as "Relude" or "Relude Oy"? The article is inconsistent on which it is.</s>
*<s>Much like with the infobox, the quote attribution in the body should not have a period unless it is a complete sentence.</s>
*<s>Company names should not be italicized, only video game/book/etc. titles.</s>
*<s>The release of the Angry Bird movies is not relevant as they are not directly related to Star Wars (unless there are Star Wars references, I haven't seen the film.) If there are Star Wars references (and I doubt it), that'll need to be expanded upon in this article.</s>
*<s>"Original trilogy" should be stylized as "original trilogy."</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 01:07, 28 January 2022 (UTC)
**Everything addressed. Thank you. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|Contact]])  11:10, 28 January 2022 (UTC)
***<s>The Wikipedia link to "Finnish" needs to be hyperlinked to the Wikipedia page [[Wikipedia:Finns|Finns]]. It's currently hyperlinked to a disambiguation page.</s>
***<s>The source you used to cite the founding date in the infobox makes no mention of November, only the year. You will need to find an alternate source to cite the complete founding date. Same goes for the date's mention in the first body paragraph.</s>
***<s>Please remove the period after "Rovio" for the quote attribution in the "Founding" section. It is not a complete sentence.</s>
***<s>"original trilogy" should not be italicized.</s>
***<s>A higher quality and better cropped version of the Rovio logo could probably be found.</s>
***<s>"Finnish" needs to be hyperlinked to the appropriate Wikipedia page in the 1st body paragraph.</s>
***<s>See if you can find a quote to use for the "''Angry Birds''" body paragraph section.</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 16:39, 28 January 2022 (UTC)
****Everything addressed but your second objection, which will take some time. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|Contact]])  21:10, 28 January 2022 (UTC)
*****All objections are now addressed. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|Contact]])  10:11, 29 January 2022 (UTC)

*<s>In the Founding Section, you need a space after the reference note between "November 10," and "2003."</s>
*<s>Founding section "on Helsinki" > "in Helsinki."</s>
*<s>Finnish in the Founding section needs to be hyperlinked to Finns' Wikipedia page.</s>
*<s>In my opinion, I don't think it's relevant that the trio won with a multiplayer game called ''King of the Cabbage World''. That's too far away from the central topic of ''Star Wars''.</s>
*<s>''Star Wars Rebels'' needs to be italicized.</s>
*<s>"The Grand Inquisitor" needs to be stylized as "the Grand Inquisitor" because the title is mentioned mid-sentence. If it were at the start of a sentence, then the "The" would be capitalized.</s>
*<s>In my opinion "From 2012 to 2022" should be changed to "Since 2012." The year 2022 isn't significant ''Star Wars''-wise since the games closed in 2020.</s>
*<s>I would end the sentence mentioned above at "including Star Wars titles" instead of continuing on past the comma. The article should go in timeline order, so I recommend moving "though most of them were discontinued in late 2020 because they were too old to support technology standards." to its own separate sentence in the bottom paragraph regarding the removal of games from the various app stores.</s>
*<s>Apple Store needs a capital S.</s>
*<s>Please try to find as exact a date for the removal of the two SW games as possible. If not, late 2020 works, but being as precise as possible is preferred.</s>
*<s>In the Gameography section, you need commas between the day and year for each game.</s>
*<s>In the external links, please put the Official website link ''above'' the Wikipedia link and rename it to "Official site" instead of "Rovio's official website."</s>
*<s>Please add further external links to Rovio's various social media sites. We have external link templates you can use for this. See [[:Category:Social_media_citation_templates|here]].</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 04:38, 31 January 2022 (UTC)
**Everything adressed. Thank you. (Note: I don't currently find the exact date in which it was discontinued) [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 09:06, 31 January 2022 (UTC)

*<s>You do not need the page hyperlinked in the external links to Facebook and Instagram.</s>
*<s>Please mention in the body that the ''Angry Birds Star Wars'' franchise had multiple books published spinning off from the games. You may not need to mention every single one in-prose though, since they're likely just licensed and credit Rovio by name only. However, if for some reason Rovio has more creative input in those books, that will need to be included in the body.</s>
*<s>Please add an external link with the {{Tl|MobyGames}} template.</s>
*<s>Please reformat the Gameography section to match how it's setup on the [[Maxis]] page.</s> [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 10:12, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
**All done. Thank you. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 21:01, 21 February 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*Review note: some important things to keep in mind for future nominations:
**When pipelinking, always place all characters inside the link brackets (e.g. <nowiki>[[Electrum (Venator-class)|''Electrum'']], not ''[[Electrum (Venator-class)|Electrum]]''; [[TIE/ln space superiority starfighter|TIE fighters]], not [[TIE/ln space superiority starfighter|TIE fighter]]s</nowiki>).
**HTML should be used instead of select punctuation (e.g. <nowiki>"&mdash;" instead of "—," "&ndash;" instead of "–," "&hellip;" instead of "..."</nowiki>).
**For file links, use the format "300px" rather than "200x200px"
*<s>Similarly, files and templates need to use underscores in place of spaces (e.g. <nowiki>[[File:Luke_Skywalker.jpg]], not [[File:Luke Skywalker.jpg]]</nowiki>).</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 12:56, 17 May 2022 (UTC)
**Thanks for the information; underscores added.&mdash; '''[[User:Samonic|<font style="color:#bd730b;">'''Samonic'''</font>]]''' [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px]] 09:21, 18 May 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
*There is no mention of its founding month on any of Rovio's social medias or websites. (Nor in their affiliate's social medias or websites). I sourced it to a page on Rovio of the Finnish Government. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] ([[User talk:Samonic|Contact]])  12:55, 29 January 2022 (UTC)

*As an aside, seeing that in addition to the two games, there are several ''Angry Birds Star Wars'' tie-in books, it might be worthwhile to make a page title "Angry Birds Star Wars (series)" that covers the franchise overall (the two games, the books, and any other spinoff material). Once that page is created it would likely need to be factored into the body of Rovio Entertainment. [[User:Dentface|Dentface]] ([[User talk:Dentface|talk]]) 10:12, 14 February 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:Samonic|Samonic]] [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|link=User:Samonic]] <small>([[User talk:Samonic|Ah, yes. The negotiator.]])</small> 21:09, 21 February 2022 (UTC)

#'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 22:51, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{AC}} [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Saber_2?type=revision&diff=11387023&oldid=11343836 Copy-edit] [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 10:32, 10 April 2022 (UTC)
#{{AC}} [[User:Master Fredcerique|<span style="color: #45CF10">'''MasterFred'''</span>]][[File:Commerce Guild.svg|20px]][[User talk:Master Fredcerique|<span style="color: #0674F3">('''talk''')</span>]] (he/him) 03:50, 12 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Macaroni=====
*<s>Shouldn't the technical stuff go in a Description section per [[WP:LG#Starship and vehicle class articles]]?</s>
**Fixed.
*<s>Context on Jake Farrell in the body.</s>
**I worded it as "Jake Farrell and other Rebel pilots" to make it clear that Farrell was also a Rebel pilot.
*<s>Subject mentioned outside of a film and subsequently established to be in a film? Smells like a [[retcon]] with {{Tl|Ret}} necessary to me.</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 18:41, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
**Its name was first used in something directly related to both ''Return of the Jedi'' and the Battle of Endor. That's kind of a gray area, and I chose to not make it a retcon in this case. Different would be cases such as [[Duron Veertag]], who wasn't even mentioned in anything around the events of ''A New Hope'' before an ''Insider'' retcon. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 21:48, 23 February 2022 (UTC)
***Hmm, so CCG ID'd a ROTJ subject? Then why not use {{Tl|1stID}}? [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 06:24, 7 March 2022 (UTC)
****You can see it being used in a later source. This is my mindset: the name wasn't clearly attached to a film interceptor at the time of the CCG's release, but it wasn't a clearcut EU subject either. Then the SW.com article confirmed it was one of the film interceptors, thus the tags I used. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 13:12, 7 March 2022 (UTC)
*****Sorry for the delay. Just so I have the chronology correct: 1) unnamed TIE appears in ROTJ 2) CCG has a definitively non-ROTJ TIE labeled as Saber 2 3) SW.com says that the unnamed ROTJ TIE is Saber 2. Is anything wrong about that? [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 21:14, 20 March 2022 (UTC)
******After Discord discussion, changed the tags to first mentioned before retcon, and adding retcon tags to appropriate things. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 02:00, 21 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is there a ROTJ image of the interceptors that can be added?</s> [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:54, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
**There is, and I'm gonna upload. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 18:01, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

====Comments====
{{ACapproved|03:50, 12 April 2022 (UTC)}}
*As I personally verified that it's not (confirmed to be) in anything else that has [[Turr Phennir]], outside what I've got literally listed in the sources. [[User:Hanzo Hasashi|Hanzo Hasashi]] ([[User talk:Hanzo Hasashi|talk]]) 14:17, 16 February 2022 (UTC)

[[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 17:55, 31 March 2022 (UTC)
#{{AC}} [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 20:00, 17 April 2022 (UTC)
#{{AC}} [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 20:32, 18 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Spooky=====
*<s>Always a pleasure to see ''Aftermath'' noms. I've fixed a few, but I think it might be worth giving the article another once-over for both missing and duplicate links.</s>
*<s>Given it's got limited mentions, I think some places the Sea is referenced could be added. For instance, when flying over the sea, Temmin notices that [[sensor array]]s can be avoided by flying close to the water.</s>
**Both done.
*<s>In Description, it might suit better to mention how Velus' made a habit of frequenting the tavern in History, and perhaps Leia's office/apartment mentions as well. There seems to be precedent among the terrestrial location GAs to describe the structures and not the people occupying them (at the point in time they're mentioned).</s>
**Moved the tavern info to History. However, I don't really see a way to move the mention of Leia without leaving the office contextless.
***A possible workaround might be something like, "Several buildings overlooked the Silver Sea during the New Republic Era, including an office, an apartment, and a tavern." On perusal, the precedent does seem to omit any character mentions in the section, given they aren't a physical trait of any said location.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:43, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
****I don't think that change is necessary. In my opinion there's no need to mention both locations twice; it makes the article less readable. Also, just saying that there is an apartment or office overlooking the sea doesn't make it clear that the apartment is connected to Leia. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 08:31, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>It might suit nicely to add that some context for the dating of the Battle of Jakku. Given it swaps sources from the rest of that paragraph, it's not immeadiately apparent that it's referring to near 5 ABY.</s>
*<s>Some slight expansion on the tavern scene might suit, there's a few details about the sea there, and Velus wasn't there alone.</s>
*<s>Context as [[season]]s for winter and spring.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 23:47, 5 March 2022 (UTC)
**These three should all be done. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 00:02, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>For Description, it's mentioned in ''Life Debt'' that the Silver Sea had a coast, which can then be paired with the details in ''Empire's End'' that said coast bordered the sea with a cliff, as the waves were crashing there.</s>
**Added
*<s>Given the length of the article expanding the intro slightly would suit nicely, perhaps briefly specifying which buildings have the view of said sea, a sentence about Rath Velus' affinity for the tavern, or maybe it's colors.</s>
**Added.
*<s>In the first paragraph of History, it seems a little repetitive to use the phrase "overlooking the Silver Sea" in back to back sentences, given that 'overlook' is also the same word from the book. Mind fiddling with one of the two?</s>
**Changed
*<s>"A tavern that overlooked the Silver Sea was frequented by Imperial defector Sinjir Rath Velus." - Didn't know how best to tweak, but a bit of time-context to this would be nice. It can be determined he did frequent the tavern prior to the visit with the crew, so perhaps an "At some point, Imperial defector Sinjir Rath Velus began frequenting a tavern overlooking the Silver Sea..." or whatnot, so that it's not spontaneously mentioned he's a regular.</s>
**How's that?
*<s>"Temmin flew close to the sea's surface to avoid sensor arrays, causing him to repeatedly crash his starfighter." a cursory observation - is every simulation confirmed to be over the Silver Sea? The way it's worded seems as if he repeatedly crashed due to said sensor array mistake, when, he did crash only once to that. Perhaps reword, to either remove repeatedly, or note that said scenario was one of a group of others that had failed.</s>
**Fixed.
*<s>If Chandrila is said to have a moon, wouldn't that warrant a page? Given it's also near to said mention, it can be specified thai 'his friends' were [[Norra Wexley's team]].</s>
**Don't think it's notable, but created the page. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 08:31, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"A tavern that overlooked the Silver Sea was frequented by Imperial defector Sinjir Rath Velus." - Didn't know how best to tweak, but a bit of time-context to this would be nice. It can be determined he did frequent the tavern prior to the visit with the crew, so perhaps an "At some point, Imperial defector Sinjir Rath Velus began frequenting a tavern overlooking the Silver Sea..." or whatnot, so that it's not spontaneously mentioned he's a regular.</s>
**You put this on here twice :P
*<s>The mentions regarding Leia's office & apartment are omitted from the History.</s>
**I avoided this intentionally. I believe it's repetitive to describe them in two spots and doesn't make sense to split up the information. 
*<s>It would make sense if the intro and the History were consistent with the either full mention of [[flight simulator]] or the pipelinking of it as [[Flight simulator|simulator]] - as both are different atm.</s>'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 05:43, 6 March 2022 (UTC)
**Done. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 08:31, 6 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>Please provide more context for the ''Aftermath'' and ''New Jedi Order'' novels as with the Legends page.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 11:17, 22 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>There is a duplicate reference in the second paragraph of the history section.</s>
**Done
*<s>Author for ''The Essential Guide to Planets and Moons''?</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 15:32, 22 March 2022 (UTC)
**Don't really see the need to add all this info about Legends sources, but done. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 16:14, 22 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Ecks=====
*<s>It's unnecessary to say a body of water has a coast; that's a defining property for any body of water. The last Description sentence should be rewritten to get rid of this redundant wording (but it's perfectly fine to say that part of the coast featured cliffs, of course).</s> [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 15:52, 15 April 2022 (UTC)
**I initially added in response to Spooky's objection, but you're right that it isn't really necessary. Removed. [[User:VergenceScatter|VergenceScatter]] ([[User talk:VergenceScatter|talk]]) 19:25, 17 April 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha=====
*<s>"''Wesell and Fett carried him out of the compound and into the Clawdite's speeder, the former promising to split the bounty as promised.''" variations of the word promise are used in close proximity here, I think you should change the first instance.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 12:24, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

=====Luca=====
*<s>The P&T sentence isn't really a personality trait, IMO: it's more like something he did.</s> [[User:LucaRoR|<span style="color: blue; text-shadow:#0066ff 0.2em 0.2em 0.4em">'''LucaRoR'''</span>]] [[File:Sigil of House Serenno.png|18px]] <sup> ([[User talk:LucaRoR|<b style="color: black">'''Talk'''</b>]])</sup> 10:30, 14 April 2022 (UTC)
**I'm trying to establish how much he cared about his collection, hence the stuff he did for it and how it was valued to him. [[User:JediMasterMacaroni|<font style="font-family:copperplate; color:#ff4d00;">'''JediMasterMacaroni'''</font>]][[User talk:JediMasterMacaroni|<sup><font style="color:#ff4d00;">(Talk)</font></sup>]] 17:13, 14 April 2022 (UTC)

Wesell and Fett carried him out of the compound and into the Clawdite's speeder, the former promising to split the bounty as they had previously agreed.''" Wesell was struggling to get into the cockpit?</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 05:04, 11 May 2022 (UTC)

*<s>"Saddened by the deaths resulting from the battle, Sister arranged the helmets of her fallen comrades beneath a tree as a memorial." Should this specify it was clone deaths, or even specifically her brothers, since there were nonClones in the army? [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 15:32, 29 April 2022 (UTC)</s>

*<s>For the BTS, should drawing  of Sticks be linked to the art in question? See [[Landonis Balthazar Calrissian#Behind the scenes|Lando's BTS]], 5th para, for an example. [[User:NBDani|NBDani]] ([[User talk:NBDani|talk]]) 15:32, 29 April 2022 (UTC)</s>
**It's an interesting concept - but is there SA precedent for linking to images in body text? It seems a bit odd to me quite honestly, more of a thing that has little relevance to Sister in this case when it'd be covered in the other character's Behind the scenes.'''—[[User:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">spookywilloww</span>]]<sup>[[User talk:Spookywilloww|<span style="color:#aa76de; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">talk</span>]]</sup>''' 23:58, 2 May 2022 (UTC)

=====Shayanomer=====
*<s>You have infobox-exclusive information: this being a military shooter and being a part of the ''Republic Commando'' series.</s> [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 18:44, 9 June 2022 (UTC)
**Hi Shay, thanks for the copy-edit. Is not the info that it is a sequel to RC enough to cover the genre (in the first Development section)? And the link to the series is already in Continuity. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 19:07, 9 June 2022 (UTC)
***1.) Not really, it should be made explicitly clear. Sometimes sequels don't carry over the genre. 2.) Yes, but the article doesn't say it's a part of the series. [[User:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#DEB40D">'''Shayanomer'''</span>]] [[File:Din Djarin's clan.svg|15px]] ([[User talk:Shayanomer|<span style="color:#A06800">'''talk'''</span>]]) 19:14, 9 June 2022 (UTC)
****Sure, both added. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 20:57, 9 June 2022 (UTC)

=====Imp=====
*<s>Can you please tell me which source says that the game was to be set during the "Imperial Period"?</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:09, 26 June 2022 (UTC)
**Added context. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 21:21, 27 June 2022 (UTC)
***I'd like you to be more precise with the dating in this article. If all we know is that the game would have been set during the reign of the Empire and would have featured the Rebel Alliance, then it would have been set between 19 BBY and 4 ABY, which is what I'd like you to add to the infobox and the body. Saying that it would have been set after 19 BBY, based on just the existence of the Empire alone, is not accurate enough, since it conceivably could have been set ''in'' 19 BBY. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 21:35, 27 June 2022 (UTC)
****OK, I think I got it. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 13:01, 30 June 2022 (UTC)
*****Can you please clean that addition up? No offense, but it's currently a bit of a mess - typo, bad grammar, lack of sourcing for some of the statements. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 12:49, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
******Ok, made some adjustments. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 16:51, 7 July 2022 (UTC)
*******"''The game was to take place during the...''" &mdash; this still needs a source added that supports it. And the Rebel Alliance was not formed in 19 BBY. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 20:26, 8 July 2022 (UTC)
********Ok, I think I added the needed specificity. And I removed the 4 ABY because we don't know if it would have extended all the way to Endor. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 12:56, 17 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is what's currently in the Continuity section explicitly talked about in the source, or is that your commentary? I'm asking because not all of the ''Republic Commando'' series (for example, the short stories) follows the Delta Squad.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:39, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
**It's more of an extrapolation based on what Brett said in the Cinelinx interview. I added a line to clarify it. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 13:20, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Is the Development image concept art for ''Imperial Commando''? If it is, it contains a whole lot of info that should be covered in Appearances and Plot summary.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:51, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
**Indeed it is. One of the few available. I didn't include it based on a Discord discussion about concept art not necessarily translating into the game. [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 13:20, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
***In that case, I don't understand why you're treating some of the concept art (commandos in Katarn armor, lightsabers and Rebel starfighters) as applicable, but not this specific piece. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 13:33, 28 July 2022 (UTC)
****Sorry, a little clarity. The article does numerate and list some of the basics from the concept art, it just avoids too much specificity like the species (and it is a given that those types of things would be involved). [[User:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:bllue">'''Corellian Premier'''</span>]][[File:Rogue Squadron.svg|20px]]<sup>[[User talk:Corellian Premier|<span style="color:green">MTFBWY</span>]]</sup> 15:00, 29 July 2022 (UTC)
*****So there's some sort of textual basis in ''Rogue Leaders: The Story of LucasArts'' that supports it being more certain that lightsabers and Rebel starfighters would have appeared in the game than Wookiees, Twi'leks (the rightmost figure in the image looks like a Twi'lek to me, at least), and Humans? And either way, I'm now more convince that all of the details from this or any other concept art image pertinent to ''Imperial Commando'' should be described in the article's text. Whether it should all be in Appearances is a different matter, but again, it depends on what exactly the sources have to say about those story details. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 15:14, 29 July 2022 (UTC)
******Please note the specific starfighter models in Appearances, as well. [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 11:10, 17 August 2022 (UTC)

Because you should not assume that based on that image alone.</s> [[User:Imperators II|<b><span>Imperators II</span></b>]]<sup>[[User talk:Imperators II|(Talk)]]</sup> 08:58, 18 August 2022 (UTC)

====Object====
=====Braha'wind=====
*<s>Context needed for the Virgillian Free Alignment in both the intro and history.</s> [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 20:33, 20 March 2022 (UTC)
**Is that any better? I'm not really sure how to make them less repetitive. '''[[User:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">Dropbearemma</span>]]''' <sup>([[User talk:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">she/her</span>]])</sup> 13:06, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***I've made a tweak in the history section [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Stormwind?diff=11332152&oldid=11332031 here]. Just to make sure you're all fine and dandy with that? [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 13:26, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
****Do you think it implies that the VFA are fighting the Aristocracy 'because' the Aristocracy is pro-Imperial or am I interpreting it in an unintuitive way? The VFA is definitely anti-Imperial, but the reasons they're fighting the Aristocracy (not that we know what they are!) pre-date the Empire. '''[[User:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">Dropbearemma</span>]]''' <sup>([[User talk:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">she/her</span>]])</sup> 14:19, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*****It depends if you reckon the text is trying to imply that much. I think the two factions having different governmental (pro and anti Imperial) alignments would definitely maintain their rivalry. [[User:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Braha'tok enthusiast</span>]] <sup>[[User talk:Braha'tok enthusiast|<span style="color:#0047ab; font-family:Trebuchet MS;">Hello there</span>]]</sup> 11:38, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
******Fair! I'm fine with the edit, then! '''[[User:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">Dropbearemma</span>]]''' <sup>([[User talk:Dropbearemma|<span style="color: purple;">she/her</span>]])</sup> 11:39, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

=====OOM=====
*<s>Please see [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Surveyor-class_reconnaissance_frigate?curid=665295&diff=11331974&oldid=11324215 my edit]. The main takeaways here are in the "Armament and reconnaissance systems," which I reorganised for clarity (following [[Invincible|FA precedence]]), made it consistently refer to the ship in its singular form, and corrected the use of [[WP:DASH|dashes]]&mdash;the en dash should only be used to hyphenate compound words.</s>
**Anything else I need to change here? [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:25, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***Nah, just wanted to show you the changes I've made and explain why I made them.
*<s>Per [[WP:MOS#Linking]], individual words within proper compound nouns (such as "''Surveyor''-class reconnaissance frigate") should not be linked.</s>
**You should link it like this instead at the start of the article body: "<nowiki>''Surveyor''-class [[Scout ship|reconnaissance frigate]]</nowiki>" [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 09:57, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***Done. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:25, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>Just wanting to confirm, in the interest of not making original comparisons: does ''Lead by Example'' really directly compare the Surveyor to other classes of ships, such as the Vindicator or the Bellator?</s>
**Yes. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:25, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''powerful, extremely long-ranged sensor suites among the most sophisticated in the Imperial Navy''" &mdash; grammatical error here</s>
**I'm pretty sure that this is correct. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:25, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***There's nothing connecting the sensor suites to the statement that they're among the most sophisticated ones in the navy
****"Among" is working adjectivally to describe the sensor suites. I think that this is right. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 00:21, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
*****It was missing "that were," though I've fixed it myself. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:23, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
******Not sure why we need to say "that were", but ok. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:23, 30 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>"''that promoted a high degree of effectiveness in scouting and information gathering''" &mdash; this information better belongs in the "Armament and reconnaissance systems" section, since it has more to do with those than the ship's role.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 07:27, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
**I think that this adds extra detail to the role. I don't think that it is necessary in "Armament and reconnaissance systems" because that section already explains how it is effective at those things. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 10:27, 27 March 2022 (UTC)
***Sure, but I still don't believe there is a need to repeat what the ship's equipment do in the Role section, which is why I think the words that I quoted above should be removed. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 17:01, 28 March 2022 (UTC)
****I condensed it, unless you don't want any of that part. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 00:20, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
*****I only meant removing the part I quoted above. Please see my edit [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Surveyor-class_reconnaissance_frigate?diff=11334822&oldid=11334511 here]. [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:23, 29 March 2022 (UTC)
******Looks fine to me. [[User:Loqiical|Loqiical]] ([[User talk:Loqiical|talk]]) 05:23, 30 March 2022 (UTC)
*<s>I have also edited the infobox to include the Oxford comma, as well as to maintain consistency with the language used in the prose. Please review [https://starwars.fandom.com/wiki/Surveyor-class_reconnaissance_frigate?curid=665295&diff=11335868&oldid=11334822 my edit] and ensure that everything is in order.</s> [[User:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111">'''OOM'''</span>]] [[User talk:OOM 224|<span style="color:#d1a111;font-family:franklin gothic">224</span>]] 21:31, 29 March 2022 (UTC)

***That one is fine either way, since "projector" in this instance is just a synonym of "emitter," but if the source only uses one of those two terms, then I'd recommend sticking to the source's wording. *<s>What's the reason for stripping the default quote formatting in the Bts?</s>
**I assumed we treated real-world quotes differently at the time, but I've removed it. -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 00:32, 24 April 2022 (UTC)
***Please use single quotation marks (' ') for quotes within quotes, per the Manual of Style. [[User:Xd1358|<span style="color:#336600;font-weight:bold;">1358</span>]] [[User_talk:Xd1358|<sup style="color:#336600;">(Talk)</sup>]] 20:51, 3 May 2022 (UTC)
****Sorry for replying so late, but {{U|JediMasterMacaroni}} took care of that 10 days ago. -- [[User:YakovChaimTzvi|YakovChaimTzvi]] <small>(he/him/his)</small> [[File:ChissAscendancyCanonSymbol.svg|20px|linkWP:Chiss]] ([[User_talk:YakovChaimTzvi|talk]]) 05:12, 16 May 2022 (UTC)

*Review note: I removed the link to [[treason]] because that article discusses the legal concept of treason (i.e. against a government) rather than the general act of betraying someone. *Review note: [https://www.albert.io/blog/coordinating-conjunctions/#What_is_a_Coordinating_Conjunction coordinating conjunctions] should really never be placed directly after a semicolon unless the semicolon is being used in place of a comma (ie in a list). ====Object====
=====OOM=====
*<s>Nice to see you back in action. Just a few things:</s>
**Given that "TL-50 Repeater" is just a shortened form of "TL-50 Heavy Repeater," I'd just remove it from the intro.
***Thank you! Since "TL-50 Repeater" is no longer presented as an alternate name in the intro, I've also removed the {{Tl|1stID}} from the Sources list. Let me know what you think.
**Some of the images can be enlarged to better fit the new default Fandomdesktop skin.
***How are they now?
